anya-e1102n:8_0: Varadaṃ varadaṃ aggaṃ, diccaṃ diccaṃva vanajaṃ;
anya-e1102n:10_0: Santaṃ santaṃ sadā vaṭṭaṃ, pajaṃ’bhave sutaṃ;
anya-e1102n:12_0: Sutaṃ sutaṃ bhavane yaṃ, natanaṃ natanā’rahaṃ;
anya-e1102n:16_0: Vinaye sati ṭhite yaṃ, sāsanaṃ saṇṭhitaṃ bhave;
anya-e1102n:17_0: Vinaye sati naṭṭhe yaṃ, vinaṭṭhaṃ sāsanaṃ bhave.
anya-e1102n:22_0: Yadi me īdisaṃ cittaṃ, bhaveyyuṃ pāpasaṅkappā;
anya-e1102n:36_0: Buddhuppādo hi dullabho, tato pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca, vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e1102n:37_0: Buddho ca dullabho loke, saddhammasavanampi ca;
anya-e1102n:42_0: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne ṭhatvā buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttāya kathāya vuccamānāya sādhūnaṃ cittasampahaṃsanañceva,
anya-e1102n:42_4: Amhākaṃ kira bhagavā brahmadevabuddhamādiṃ katvā yāva porāṇasakyagotamā manopaṇidhivasena,
anya-e1102n:42_5: kaṭṭhavāhanajātakaṃādiṃkatvā yāva majjhimadīpaṅkarā vācaṅgavasena majjhimadīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya
anya-e1102n:42_6: kāyavācaṅgavasena sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā yāva vessantarattabhāvā vīsati asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūrentassa
anya-e1102n:42_7: sabbaññutaññāṇatthāya yeva alaṅkataṃ sīsaṃ chinditvā dentassa sabbaññubodhisattassa sīsaṃ jambudīpavāsīnaṃ
anya-e1102n:42_9: añjitanayanaṃ uppāṭetvā dentassa nayanaṃ ajaṭākāse gaganatale tārāgaṇatopi bahutaraṃ,
anya-e1102n:42_10: hadayamaṃsaṃ vā dakkhiṇabāhuṃ vā chinditvā dentassa maṃsaṃ chanahuta aṭṭhasa hassādhikasatasahassapamāṇasinerurājatopi bahutaraṃ,
anya-e1102n:42_11: lohitaṃ uppāṭetvā dentassa ruhiraṃ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṃ,
anya-e1102n:42_12: maddīsadise ca bhariye jālīkaṇhājinasadise ca putte paresaṃ dāsatthāya dentassa gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
anya-e1102n:45_0: Jātattakīsotattakiyā vuttanayena asūro hutvā buddhattaṃ cintentasseva sattaasaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n:45_1: Atisūro ahutvā vācāmattameva nava asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n:45_2: Atisūro hutvā kāyaṅgavācaṅgavasena pūrentassa cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n:45_3: Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya veditabbāni.
anya-e1102n:45_5: Vessantarattabhāvena ca sattakamahādānaṃ datvā sattakkhattuṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā vaṅkapabbataṃ gantvā nayanasadise
anya-e1102n:45_6: dve putte brāhmaṇassa dāsatthāya datvā dutiyadivase brāhmaṇavaṇṇena āgatassa sakkassa devarañño attasamaṃ
anya-e1102n:45_7: maddiṃ nāma bhariyaṃ datvā tasmiṃ bhave aparimeyyāni puññāni katvā tato tusitapuraṃ gantvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
anya-e1102n:48_0: Yāciyamāno kālaṃ dīpañca desañca kulaṃ mātaramevacāti imāni pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tusitapurato
anya-e1102n:48_1: cavitvā mahāsammatavaṃsajassa okkākarañño puttānaṃ kusalambhedabhayena bhaginīhiyeva saddhiṃ āvāhakaraṇaṃ
anya-e1102n:48_2: sutvā sakyā vata bho rājakumārāti okkākamahārājena vuttavacanaṃ pavattanimittaṃ katvā sakyāti laddhanāmānaṃ
anya-e1102n:48_3: rājūnamabbhantare pavattassa suddhodanamahārājassa jeṭṭhamahesiyā sirimahāmāyāya kucchimhi nibbattitvā
anya-e1102n:48_4: dasamāsaccayena devadahanagarassa kapilavatthussa ca majjhe lumbinīvane mātukucchito nikkhamitvā jātakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e1102n:48_5: uttarābhimukhaṃ sattapadavītihārena gantvā achambhivācaṃ nicchāretvā pitaraṃ vandāpetvā anukkamena soḷasavassuddesikakāle
anya-e1102n:48_6: rajjasiriṃ anubhavitvā rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase nikkhamitvā chabbassāni dukkaracariyaṃ caritvā vesākhapuṇṇamadivase
anya-e1102n:48_7: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā pañcacattālīsa vassāni devamanussānaṃ ratanadāmaṃ ganthento
anya-e1102n:48_8: viya dhammaratanavassaṃ vassāpetvā yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā katabuddhakicce kusinārāyaupavaṭṭane
anya-e1102n:48_9: mallānaṃ sālavane vesākhapuṇṇamadivase paccūsasamaye anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbute bhagavatilokanāthe
anya-e1102n:48_10: subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena “alaṃ āvuso mā socittha mā paridevittha,
anya-e1102n:48_12: upaddutā ca homa’idaṃ vo kappati idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti.
anya-e1102n:48_13: Idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma taṃ karissāma,
anya-e1102n:48_14: yaṃ na icchissāma na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanaṃ sallakkhetvā gaṇapāmokkhānaṃ sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ
anya-e1102n:48_15: saṅghatthero āyasmā mahākassapo dhammasaṅgītiṃ katvā parisuddhe dhammavinaye tato aparabhāge vassasatassa
anya-e1102n:48_16: accayena vesāliyā vajjiputtakā dasavatthūni dassetvā sāsanavipattiṃ karonte disvā āyasmatā yasattherena
anya-e1102n:48_17: kākaṇḍakaputtena samussāhiyamāno dutiyasaṅgītiṃ katvā tato aparabhāge tathāgatassa parinibbānato dvinnaṃ
anya-e1102n:48_18: vassasatānaṃ upari aṭṭhārasame vasse dhammāsokonāma rājā sakalajambudīpatale ekarajjābhisekaṃ pāpuṇitvā
anya-e1102n:48_19: buddhasāsane mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattetvā parihīnalābhasakkārā titthiyā antamaso ghāsacchādanamattampi
anya-e1102n:48_20: alabhantā lābhasakkāraṃ patthayamānā sāsane pabbajitvā sakāni sakāni diṭṭhigatāni dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ
anya-e1102n:48_22: Tadā dhammāsokarañño pattābhisekato sattarasame vasse saṭṭhisatasahassa bhikkhūsu sahassabhikkhuṃ gahetvā
anya-e1102n:48_23: moggaliputtatisso nāma saṅghatthero mahāpavāraṇāya parappavādaṃ bhinditvā kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ desetvā
anya-e1102n:48_24: tatiyadhammasaṅgītiṃ katvā parisuddhe dhammavinaye sāṭṭhakathebuddhavacane dharanteva pāḷiyaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e1102n:48_25: atthacchāyaṃ gahetvā attano mativasena nānāganthavisesāni karonti,
anya-e1102n:48_26: tesu attanomativasena atthacchāyaṃ gahetvā kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ katvā vuttavacanaṃ sārato sallakkhetvā sutta-
anya-e1102n:48_28: aṭṭhakathāya ca pāḷiṃ tabbivaraṇabhūtaṃ sāratthadīpaniñca aññāni ca ganthavisesāni asaṃsanditvā attanomatiyāpi
anya-e1102n:48_29: pubbāparaṃ asamānetvā vādappakāsanamattameva ṭhapetvā garukalahukesu garukeyeva ṭhātabbepi garuke aṭṭhatvā
anya-e1102n:48_30: keci bhikkhū nadiyā udakukkhepaṃ akatvā karonti.
anya-e1102n:48_32: Idañca bhindanaṃ kosambakakkhandhake bhinnatopi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena balavatarameva sāsanassa vipattikāraṇattā,
anya-e1102n:48_33: tathā hi na idaṃ manussaloke bhikkhūnaṃyeva hoti,
anya-e1102n:48_37: tāsaṃ sahāyakānaṃ bhummanissitadevatānampi tāsaṃ sahāyakānaṃ rukkhanissitadevatānampi tāsaṃsahāyakānaṃ ākāsaṭṭhakadevatānampi,
anya-e1102n:48_40: evaṃ mittaparamparavasena chakāmāvacaradevatānampi tāsaṃ mittānaṃ brahmapārisajjānampīti evaṃ yāvaakaniṭṭhabrahmalokā
anya-e1102n:48_41: ariyapuggale ṭhapetvā sabbe puthujjanā devamanussā bhinnā honti,
anya-e1102n:48_42: tesaṃ bhinnattā bahu ca pāpaṃ pasavati,
anya-e1102n:48_44: aṭṭhakathāya ca pāḷiṃ saṃsanditvā tāni tāni ganthavisesāni ca ekato katvā gaṅgodake na yamunodakaṃ viya
anya-e1102n:48_45: missitvā ekībhāvaṃ katvā sīmavisodhaniṃ nāma karissāmi,
anya-e1102n:48_46: taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasikarotha dhammarājassa sāvakāti.
anya-e1102n:49_0: Tattha buddhuppādo dullabho ti buddhassa uppādakālo dullabho tathā hi anuppannakāle buddhe buddhoti saddampi
anya-e1102n:50_0: Tato pabbajā ca upasampadācā tiettha topaccayo lāmakatthe,
anya-e1102n:50_3: tamanupabbajjā ca upasampadā ca dullabhāyevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e1102n:50_4: Yathā ca loke kiñcideva mahagghaṃ alabhitabbaṃ labhitvā vā tena sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ appagghampi mahagghaṃ mahagghaṃ dullabhaṃ dullabhanti vuccati,
anya-e1102n:50_5: evameva atidullabhaṃ buddhuppādaṃ āgamma tamanupabbajitampi dullabhanti vuccati,
anya-e1102n:50_6: yathā ca nidiyā uparimabhāge sattāhavaṭṭalikādibhāvena udakapūraṇe heṭṭhā kismiñci ṭhāne tarituṃ avisahantā idameva ṭhānaṃ dukkaranti vuccati,
anya-e1102n:50_7: evameva buddhakāraṇassa dukkarabhāve na tamanupabbajjupasampadāpi dukkaraṃ dullabhanti vuccati.
anya-e1102n:50_8: Aññathā buddhabhagavato pi pabbajjupasampadabhāvoyeva seṭṭho bhaveyya.
anya-e1102n:50_10: yathā semhoguḷoti tathā hi guḷassa pi vanapaccayā semho ussanno,
anya-e1102n:50_11: taṃ jano guḷenasemhoti vattabbepi kāraṇasmiṃ guḷe phalabhūtaṃ semhaṃ ropetvā semho guḷoti vuccati,
anya-e1102n:50_12: evaṃ kāraṇassa dukkarattā dullabhe buddhuppāde tamanukriyā pabbajjāpi taṃ mūlakāraṇabhūte buddhuppāde ropetvā dullabhā pabbajjāti vuccati.
anya-e1102n:50_16: jāyamānesu vā majjhimadese jāyamānopi micchādiṭṭhibhūtā vā,
anya-e1102n:50_17: sammādiṭṭhikule jāyamānāpi cakkhusota vikalabhāvena aṅgavikalā vā buddhadassanaṃ na arahanti,
anya-e1102n:50_19: Supaṇṇanāgarājādīnaṃ tasmiṃ bhave maggaphalabhāgino na honti,
anya-e1102n:55_0: Pabbajjā ticettha sāmaññena vuttepi sāmaṇerāva adhippetā,
anya-e1102n:55_2: Sāmaṇerā ca nāma buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmityādinā tikkhattuṃ vatvā ubhatosuddhivaseneva sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n:55_4: Tāni pāḷivasena asakkonto atthavasena “idañca samādāya vattehī”ti ācikkhitumpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e1102n:55_14: Tattha bhagavā ehi bhikkhubhāvāya upanissayasampannaṃ puggalaṃ disvā rattapaṃsukūlantarato suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e1102n:55_15: dakkhiṇahatthaṃ nīharitvā brahmaghosaṃ nicchārento “ehi bhikkhu cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti vadati.
anya-e1102n:56_0: Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūcica bandhanaṃ;
anya-e1102n:58_0: Evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahiparikkhārehi sarīre paṭimuttoyeva vassasatikatthero viya iriyāpathasampanno buddhācariyako
anya-e1102n:58_3: Bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ etasmiṃ kāle ehi bhikkhupasampadāya eva upasampādeti.
anya-e1102n:60_0: Eko ca thero sappañño; Sabbe te ehi bhikkhukāti.
anya-e1102n:61_0: Ete vinayapiṭake niddiṭṭhaehibhikkhū nāma vinayapiṭake aniddiṭṭhā pana tisataparivāraselabrāhmaṇādayo.
anya-e1102n:63_0: Ete hi sabbe saṅkhātā, sabbe te ehibhikkhukāti.
anya-e1102n:64_0: Taṃ sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsasahassāni chasatāni ekacattālīsuttarāni ca honti.
anya-e1102n:65_0: Bhagavā hi anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā aṭṭhārasakoṭibrāhmaṇānaṃ amataṃ pāyetvā paṭhamavassaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:65_2: bhagavā hi āsāḷhinakkhattapuṇṇamiyaṃ bārāṇasiyā isipatane migadāye paṭhamavassaṃ vasitvā phagguṇamāse
anya-e1102n:65_3: phagguṇapuṇṇamiyaṃ rājagahaṃ patvā bimbisāraraññā kārite veḷuvana vihāre ekamāsamattaṃ vasitvā citramāse
anya-e1102n:65_4: vīsatikhīṇāsavasahassaparivuto kapilavatthuṃ gantvā asītiyā ñātisahassānaṃ majjhe vippaṭipannānaṃ rājūnaṃ
anya-e1102n:65_5: matthake paṃsurajaṃ okiritvā te vandāpetvā pokkharavassañca vassāpetvā tamāgamma asītiyā ñātisahassānaṃ
anya-e1102n:65_6: vessantara jātakaṃ kathetvā rāhulamātaramāgamma candakinnarījātakañca kathetvā pitaraṃ anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e1102n:65_8: tena vuttaṃ dutiya tatiya catuttha vassesu rājagahe veḷuvanavihāre vassaṃ vasī”ti.
anya-e1102n:65_12: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā sunāparantaraṭṭhe kira ekasmiṃ vāṇijakagāme dve bhātaro.
anya-e1102n:65_13: Tesu kadāci jeṭṭho pañcasakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ āharati,
anya-e1102n:65_15: Imasmiṃ pana samaye kaniṭṭhaṃ ghare ṭhapetvā jeṭṭhabhātiko pañca sakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadacārikaṃ
anya-e1102n:65_16: caranto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanassa avidūre pañcasakaṭasatāni ṭhapetvā bhuttapātarāso parijanaparivuto
anya-e1102n:65_18: Tena ca samayena sāvatthivāsino bhuttapātarāsā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya suṭṭhuttarāsaṅgā gandhapupphādihatthā yenabuddho,
anya-e1102n:65_21: tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbharā hutvā dikkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ gacchanti.
anya-e1102n:65_22: So te disvā “kahaṃ ime gacchantī”ti ekaṃ manussaṃ pucchi.
anya-e1102n:65_25: icceva mahājano satthusantike dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchatīti.
anya-e1102n:65_26: Tassa “buddho”ti vacanaṃ chavicammādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:65_27: Atha attano parijanaparivuto tāya parisāyasaddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāmadhurassarena dhammaṃ desentassa
anya-e1102n:65_28: parisa pariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi.
anya-e1102n:65_29: Atha tathāgatena kālaṃ viditvā parisāya uyyojitāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā svātanāya nimantetvā
anya-e1102n:65_30: dutiyadivase maṇḍapaṃ karetvā āsanāni paññāpetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne
anya-e1102n:65_32: Bhuttapātaraso uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “ettakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vissajjitaṃ ettakaṃ
anya-e1102n:65_33: pana na vissajjita”nti sabbaṃ ācikkhitvā “imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ mayhaṃ kaniṭṭhassa dehī”ti sabbaṃ niyyotetvā
anya-e1102n:65_34: satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhāna parāyaṇo ahosi.
anya-e1102n:65_35: Athassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e1102n:65_37: yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gaccheyya”nti.
anya-e1102n:65_38: Atha pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n:65_40: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo sūnāparantaraṭṭhaṃ patvā sammatapabbataṃ nāma pavisitvā vāṇijakagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
anya-e1102n:65_41: Atha naṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā sagehaṃ netvā bhikkhaṃ datvā “bhante aññattha agantvā idheva vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā vasāpesi.
anya-e1102n:65_43: Tattha samuddavīciyo āgantvā ayakaṇṭapāsāṇesu paharitvā mahāsaddaṃ karonti.
anya-e1102n:65_44: Thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto na phāsuvihāro hotīti samuddaṃ nisaddaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:65_46: Tattha sakuṇasaṅgho ussanno rattiñca divā ca saddo eko baddho hoti.
anya-e1102n:65_47: Thero “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ aphāsukanti tato makuḷakārāmavihāraṃ nāma gato.
anya-e1102n:65_48: So vāṇijagāmassa nātidūro nāccāsanno gamanāgamanasampanno vivitto appasaddo.
anya-e1102n:65_49: Thero “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ phāsuka”nti tattha rattiṭṭhānadivāṭhāne caṅkamanādīni kāretvā vassaṃ upagacchati.
anya-e1102n:65_51: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃyeva antovasse pañca vāṇijakasatāni “parasamuddaṃ gacchāmā”ti nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:65_52: Nāvārohanadivase therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā theraṃ bhojetvā therassa santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā gacchanto
anya-e1102n:65_55: Nāvā ūmijavena gacchamānā aññataraṃ dīpaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e1102n:65_59: Atheko vā siyā rukkhaṃ ākoṭetvā lohitacandanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “bho mayaṃ lābhatthāya parasamuddaṃ gacchāma,
anya-e1102n:65_60: ito ca uttari lābhā nāma natthi,
anya-e1102n:65_63: Te tathā kariṃsu candanavane adhivatthā amanussā kujjhitvā imehi amhākaṃ candanavanaṃ nāsitaṃ,
anya-e1102n:65_64: ghātessāma ne”ti cintetvā na imesu ghāṭitesu sabbaṃ ekakuṇapaṃ bhavissati,
anya-e1102n:65_66: Atha tesaṃ nāvaṃ ārūyha muhuttaṃ gatakāleyeva uppādikaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā sayampi te amanussā bhayānakāni rūpāni dassayiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:65_68: Therassa kaniṭṭho cūḷapuṇṇakuṭumbiko “mayhaṃ bhātā avassayo hotū”ti therassa namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:65_69: Thero pi kira tasmiṃyeva khaṇe āvajjetvā tesaṃ byasanappattiṃ ñatvā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā abhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:65_70: Amanussā theraṃ disvāva “ayyapuṇṇatthero ehī” ti pakkamiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:65_72: Thero “mā bhāyathā”ti tesaṃ assāsetvāva kahaṃ gantukāmatthā”ti pucchi.
anya-e1102n:65_73: “Bhante amhākaṃ sakaṭṭhānameva gacchāmā”ti thero nāvaṃ phale akkamitvā “etesaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatū”ti adhiṭṭhāti.
anya-e1102n:65_74: Vāṇijā sakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ puttadārassa ārocetvā “etha theraṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmā”ti pañcasatāni
anya-e1102n:65_75: attano attano pañcamātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesuṃ.
anya-e1102n:65_76: Tato nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ otāretvā therassa ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā “ayaṃ bhante tumhākaṃ koṭṭhāso”ti āhaṃsu.
anya-e1102n:65_81: Evaṃ satthāraṃ passissathāti te sādhu bhante’ti tena ca koṭṭhāsena attano ca koṭṭhāsena maṇḍalamāḷaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:65_82: Satthā kirassa āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya paribhogaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1102n:65_83: Tatho manussā rattiṃ obhāsaṃ disvā “mahesakkhā devatā atthī”ti saññaṃkariṃsu.
anya-e1102n:65_84: Upāsakā maṇḍalamāḷañca bhikkhusaṅghassa senāsanāni ca niṭṭhapetvā dānasambhāraṃ sajjetvā “kataṃ bhante amhehi attanokiccaṃ,
anya-e1102n:65_86: Thero sāyanhasamaye iddhiyāsāvatthiṃ patvā “bhante vāṇijagāmavāsino tumhe daṭṭhukāmā,
anya-e1102n:65_89: Thero bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā sakaṭṭhānameva paccāgato.
anya-e1102n:65_90: Bhagavā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi “ānanda sve sūnāparante vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya carissāma,
anya-e1102n:65_92: Thero sādhu bhante’ti bhikkhusaṅghassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “cārikā salākaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:65_93: Taṃ divasaṃ kuṇḍadhānatthero paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ aggahoti.
anya-e1102n:65_94: Vāṇijagāmavāsinopi “sve kira satthā āgamissatī”ti gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaggaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:65_95: Bhagavā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi.
anya-e1102n:65_97: So kiṃ idanti āvajjetvā satthu sūnāparantagamanaṃ disvā visukammaṃ āmantesi “tāta ajja bhagavā tīṇimattāni yojanasatāni piṇḍācāraṃ gamissati,
anya-e1102n:65_98: pañca kūṭāgārasatāni māpetvā jetavanadvāra koṭṭhamatthake gamanasajjāniṃ katvā ṭhapehī”ti,
anya-e1102n:65_103: satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapita kūṭāgāresu dhurakūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1102n:65_104: Dve aggasāvake ādiṃ katvā ekūnapañcabhikkhusatānipi kūṭāgāraṃ gantvā nisinnā ahesuṃ,
anya-e1102n:65_107: Satthā saccabandhapabbataṃ nāma patvā kūṭāgāraṃ ākāse ṭhapetvā tasmiṃ pabbate saccabandho nāma micchādiṭṭhi,
anya-e1102n:65_108: so mahājanaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ uggaṇhāpento lābhaggayasaggappatto hutvā vasati.
anya-e1102n:65_109: Abbhantare cassa antocāṭiyaṃ padīpo viya arahattassa upanissayo jalati,
anya-e1102n:65_110: taṃ disvā “dhammamassa kathessāmī”ti gantvā dhammaṃ deseti.
anya-e1102n:65_113: ehi bhikkhu hutvā iddhimayapattacīvaro kūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1102n:65_114: Bhagavā kūṭāgāragatehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehisaddhiṃ vāṇijagāmaṃ gantvā kūṭāgārāni adissamānāni katvā vāṇijagāmaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e1102n:65_115: Vāṇijā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā sasatthāraṃ makuḷakārāmaṃ nayiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:65_118: tāva pātarāsaṃ katvā uposathaṅgāni samādāya gandhañca pupphañca ādāya dhammasavanatthāya ārāmaṃ paccāgamāsi.
anya-e1102n:65_122: Satthā mahājanassa saṅgahatthaṃ katipāhaṃ tattheva vasi,
anya-e1102n:65_124: Tattha katipāhaṃ vasitvā vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya caritvā “tvaṃ idheva vasāhī”ti puṇṇattheraṃ nivattetvā antare nammadānadī nāma atthi,
anya-e1102n:65_126: Nammadānāgarājā satthu paccuggantvā nāgabhavanaṃ pavesetvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ akāsi.
anya-e1102n:65_127: Satthā tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā nāgabhavanā nikkhami.
anya-e1102n:65_130: Taṃ vīcīsu āgahāsu pidhiyati vīcīsu gatāsu vivarati,
anya-e1102n:65_132: Satthā tato nikkhamma saccabandhapabbataṃ gantvā saccabandhaṃ āha “tayā mahājano apāyamagge otārito.
anya-e1102n:65_133: Tvaṃ idheva vasitvā etesaṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetvā nibbānamagge patiṭṭhāpehī”ti.
anya-e1102n:65_135: Satthā ghanapiṭṭhipāsāṇe allamattikapiṇḍamhi lañchanaṃ viya padacetiyaṃ dassesi.
anya-e1102n:65_136: Evaṃ sūnāparantaraṭṭheyeva dve cakkaratanacetiyāni yāvasāsanantaradhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1102n:65_137: Sattame pana vasse sāvatthiyaṃ kaṇḍambarukkhamūle titthi maddanaṃ karonto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā dasahi
anya-e1102n:65_138: cakkavāḷa sahassehi āgatānaṃ devatānaṃ mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā abhidhammaṃ desente tāvatiṃsabhavane
anya-e1102n:65_147: Dasame pana vasse pālileyyāgāme dakkhiṇavanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle pālileyyakena hatthinā upaṭṭhiyamāno phāsukaṃ vassāvāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:65_149: Dvādasame verañjāyaṃ ekavāsaṃ vasi duccaritassa vipākaṃ anubhavamāno,
anya-e1102n:65_150: bhagavatā kira phussassa bhagavato kāle sāvakānaṃ vacīduccaritavasena katupacitassa akusalakammassa tadā
anya-e1102n:65_151: laddhokāsavasena upaṭṭhitattā verañjabrāhmaṇena nimantitopi samāno mārāvaṭṭana vasena asallakkhetvā assavāṇijakānaṃ
anya-e1102n:65_152: nibaddhavattasaṅkhepena paññattaṃ patthapatthamūlakaṃ yavataṇḍulameva temāsaṃ bhuñjati,
anya-e1102n:67_0: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, māca bhuñjatha sālino.
anya-e1102n:70_0: Tena vuttaṃ “dvādasame verañjāyaṃ ekavāsaṃ vasi duccaritassa vipākaṃ anubhavamāno”ti.
anya-e1102n:70_2: Catuddasame sāvatthiyaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme jetavanavihāre paṭhamavāsaṃ vasitvā pannarasame vasse
anya-e1102n:70_3: ñātijanasaṅgahatthaṃ kapilavatthuṃ gantvā ekameva vāsaṃ kappesi.
anya-e1102n:70_4: Soḷasame vasse āḷavakayakkhadamanatthaṃ aggāḷavīnagare ekavāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:70_5: Sattarasame vasse rājagahameva nivattitvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
anya-e1102n:70_8: Vīsatime vasse rājagahassa avidūre bhīsanake bhesakalavanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ kappesī”ti imāni vīsati vassāni paṭhamabodhīti veditabbāni.
anya-e1102n:70_9: Etasmiṃ kāle ehibhikkhūpasampadāyaeva upasampādesīti yebhuyyena bhagavantaṃyeva uddissa ācariyupajjhāyaṃ
anya-e1102n:70_10: katvā ehibhikkhu bhāvamāpanne puññavantapuggaleyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:70_11: aññesampi ariyabhāvamanāpannānaṃ sudinnādīnaṃ vā yamakapāṭihāriye pasīditvā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa
anya-e1102n:70_12: santike pabbajitānaṃ pubbe kassapabuddhakāle vaggulibhūtapubbānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ therasseva
anya-e1102n:70_13: santike pabbajitabhāvassa dissanato tena vuttaṃ “bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ etasmiṃ kāle ehi bhikkhūpasampadāya
anya-e1102n:70_15: Ito paresu pana pañcavīsativassesu anāthapiṇḍikena kārite jetavanamahāvihāre ekūnavīsativassā vāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:70_16: Visākhāya sattavīsati koṭidhanapariccāgena kārite pubbārāme chabbassāni vasi.
anya-e1102n:70_17: Dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ guṇamahattaṃ paṭicca sāvatthiyaṃ nissāya pañcavīsati vassāni vāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e1102n:70_18: Antime pana vasse beḷuvagāme vasitvā maraṇantikā vedanā uppajji,
anya-e1102n:71_0: Saraṇagamanūpasampadā nāma “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi”tyādinā tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ bhinditvā vuttehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampanno.
anya-e1102n:72_0: Ovādapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā nāma “tasmā tiha te kassapa evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ tibbameva hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e1102n:72_2: evañhi te kassapa sikkhitabbaṃ tasmā tiha te kassapa evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ sossāmi kusalūpasañhitaṃ
anya-e1102n:72_3: sabbantaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasikatvā sabbameva cetaso samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ sossāmīti,
anya-e1102n:72_4: evañhi te kassapa sikkhitabbaṃ tasmā tiha te kassapa evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ sātasahagataṃ me kāyagatā satiṃ na jahissatīti,
anya-e1102n:72_5: evañhi te kassapa sikkhitabbanti iminā ovādapaṭiggaṇena mahākassapattherassa anuññātaupasampadā nāma.
anya-e1102n:73_1: bhagavā kira pubbārāme anucaṅkamanto sopākasāmaṇeraṃ “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopāka rūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā,
anya-e1102n:73_2: udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti dasaasubhanissite pañhe pucchi.
anya-e1102n:73_4: Bhagavā tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “kativassosi tvaṃ sopākā”ti pucchi.
anya-e1102n:73_6: “sopāka tvaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā pañhe byākāsī”ti āraddhacitto upasampadaṃ anujānāti,
anya-e1102n:74_0: Aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā nāma bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghato ñatticatutthena bhikkhusaṅghato ñatticatutthenāti imehi dvīhi kammehi upasampadā.
anya-e1102n:74_5: Samaggena saṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena uparibhāvaṃ samāpanno pattoti upasampanno,
anya-e1102n:74_6: seṭṭhabhāvaṃ pattotiattho tathā hi gihibhāvato sāmaṇerabhāvo seṭṭho nāma,
anya-e1102n:74_8: Tattha samaggena saṅghenāti sabbantimena pariyāyena pañcavaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā,
anya-e1102n:74_10: sammukhībhūtānañca appaṭikkosanato etasmiṃ kamme samaggabhāvaṃ upagatena.
anya-e1102n:74_11: Ñatticatutthenāti tīhi anusāvanāhi ekāya ca ñattiyā kattabbena.
anya-e1102n:74_12: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ñatti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttā,
anya-e1102n:74_13: tissannaṃ pana anusāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnā ñatti tāsaṃ catutthanti katvā ñatticatutthanti vuccati.
anya-e1102n:74_16: Akuppenā ti vatthu ñatti anusāvana sīma parisasampatti sampannattā akopetabbataṃ appaṭikkositabbatañca upagatena.
anya-e1102n:74_20: Tattha sampattivipattivasena sambhavato ti vatthusampatti ñattisampatti anusāvanasampattisīmasampattiparisasampattivasena
anya-e1102n:74_22: Tattha vatthu sampattināma paripuṇṇavīsativassabhāvo idāni purisattabhāvo ca.
anya-e1102n:74_35: ti ime terasa puggalā upasampadāya avatthu.
anya-e1102n:74_36: Tattha ūnavīsativassanti sāmaññena vuttepi mātukucchito nikkhamanato paṭṭhāya ekūnavīsaparipuṇṇo purisapuggalo upasampadāya vatthu,
anya-e1102n:74_37: tato oraṃ na upasampadāya vatthu tatho hi ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare hemantagimhavassavasena tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ sambhavattā tayo utū honti,
anya-e1102n:80_0: Ettha ca kattikassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva phagguṇapuṇṇamā cattāro māsā hemautu nāma.
anya-e1102n:80_1: Phagguṇassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva āsāḷhīpuṇṇamā cattāro māsā gimhautu nāma.
anya-e1102n:80_2: Asāḷhakāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva aparakattikapuṇṇamā cattāro māsā vassautu nāma.
anya-e1102n:80_3: Evaṃ ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare tayo utū honti.
anya-e1102n:80_4: Tattha ekasmiṃ utumhi pakkhassa tatiyasattamesu dve dve katvā cha catuddasikā,
anya-e1102n:80_5: paṭhamadutiyacatutthapañcamachaṭṭhaaṭṭhamesu cha cha katvā aṭṭhārasa pannarasikāti evaṃ ekasaṃvacchare catuvīsati uposathā honti.
anya-e1102n:80_6: Imesu catuvīsatuposathesu cātuddasiyā ekūnatiṃsa divasā hontīti katvā ekasaṃvacchare cha ūnā divasā honti.
anya-e1102n:80_7: Iminā nayena ekūnavīsatime vasse chamāsādhikāni aṭṭhārasavassāni honti.
anya-e1102n:80_8: Tasmiṃ mātukucchimhi nibbattakāle dasamāse pakkhipitvā cattāri māsādhikāni ekūnavīsavassāni paripuṇṇāni.
anya-e1102n:80_9: Rājāno pana tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ accayena māsaṃ ākaḍḍhanti,
anya-e1102n:80_11: tasmā aṭṭhārasavasse yeva cha māsādhikāni honti.
anya-e1102n:80_12: Taṃ heṭṭhācatumāsādhika ekūnavīsatime vasse pakkhipitvā ekamāsādhikāni vīsativassāni sabbaso paripuṇṇāni honti.
anya-e1102n:80_13: Evaṃ ekūnavīsativassato paṭṭhāya gabbhavīso upasampadāya vatthūti veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:80_14: Idāni purisattabhāvo ti bhikkhuniyā abhāvato purisapuggalova idāni vaṭṭatīti adhippeto tathā hi mātugāmassa
anya-e1102n:80_16: paññattattā pana aparāni pañcavassasatāni ṭhassatīti evaṃ vassasahassameva paṭisambhidāppattasaddhammassa patiṭṭhitabhāvo vutto.
anya-e1102n:80_17: Mātugāmā ca nāma duppaññā tibbakilesā lāmakā ca.
anya-e1102n:80_18: Bhagavatā ca paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāyameva mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭhagarudhammapaṭiggahaṇena
anya-e1102n:80_20: Duppaññattā itthiyo sāsane ciraṃ na tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e1102n:80_21: tibbakilesattā yathā paññatta sikkhāpadānurūpaṃ saṃvarampi rakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:80_22: Lāmakattāpi tā aṭṭhasamāpattiṃ labhantāpi brāhmapārisajjaṃ nātikkamanti,
anya-e1102n:80_23: evaṃ bhikkhuniyā abhāvato idāni purisapuggaloti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:80_24: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā cattāri khettāni veditabbāni tathā hi mātugāmassa pabbajitattā vassasahassameva
anya-e1102n:80_29: sotāpannavasena vassasahassanti evaṃ pañcavassasahassāni paṭivedhasaddhammo tiṭṭhati.
anya-e1102n:80_30: Pariyattisaddhammopi tāniyeva na hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthi.
anya-e1102n:80_31: Nāpi pariyattiyā sati paṭivedho na hoti.
anya-e1102n:80_32: Liṅgaṃ pana pariyattiyā antarahitāya ciraṃ pavattissati,
anya-e1102n:80_34: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “paṭisambhidāppattehi vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e1102n:80_40: Aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathāyampi buddhānaṃ parinibbānato vassasahassameva paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:80_42: tato tāpi asakkontā tisso vijjā nibbattanti.
anya-e1102n:80_43: Gacchantekāle tānipi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti.
anya-e1102n:80_48: Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu,
anya-e1102n:80_50: Tato chapi abhiññā pattuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:80_51: Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
anya-e1102n:80_55: Gacchantekāle sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissantī’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:80_57: tasmā tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matameva buddhaghosācariyena tattha tattha likhitanti gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:80_58: aññathā ācariyasseva pubbāparavirodhappasaṅgo siyā ācariyabuddhaghoseneva hi sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā māgadhabhāsāya
anya-e1102n:80_60: na aññena ācariyena tasmā aṭṭhakathāya vuttavacanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:81_0: Antimavatthuajjhāpannapubbanti pārājikabhikkhu, so abhabbo sāsane upasampadakammassa laddhuṃ.
anya-e1102n:82_5: Tattha yassa paresaṃ aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhitvā asucinā āsittassa pariḷāho vūpasamati,
anya-e1102n:82_7: Yassa paresaṃ ajjhācāraṃ passato ussūyāya uppannāya pariḷāho vūpasamati,
anya-e1102n:82_11: Yo pana paṭisandhiyaṃ yeva abhāvako uppanno hoti,
anya-e1102n:82_13: Ekacco pana akusalavipākānubhāvena kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti,
anya-e1102n:82_16: keci pana yo kāḷapakkhe itthī hoti,
anya-e1102n:82_20: Etesu āsittapaṇḍakassa ca ussūyapaṇḍakassa ca pabbajjā na vāritā.
anya-e1102n:82_22: Tesupi pakkhapaṇḍakassa yasmiṃ pakkhe paṇḍako hoti,
anya-e1102n:82_24: Ettha ca apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbajitvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabboti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:82_28: paṇḍakassa kilesakkhayā sambhavato khīṇakilesassa ca paṇḍakabhāvānupapattito ahetuka paṭisandhikathāyañhi
anya-e1102n:82_33: jaccabadhirādayo viya paṇḍako jātisaddena visesetvā niddiṭṭho.
anya-e1102n:82_34: Catutthapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana abhabbapuggale dassentena paṇḍakatiracchānagataubhato byañjanakā tayo vatthuvipannā ahetukapaṭisandhikā,
anya-e1102n:82_36: evaṃ pañcavidhā paṇḍakā te paṇḍakasāmaññena avisesetvā “paṇḍakāti evameva vatvā paṇḍako bhikkhave na upasampādetabbo”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:83_0: Theyyasaṃvāsako ti yo sayameva pabbajjāliṅgaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuvassaṃ gaṇetvā bhikkhūti paṭiññaṃ sampaṭicchati,
anya-e1102n:83_2: so liṅgassa saṃvāsassa ca thenattā ubhayatthenako nāma.
anya-e1102n:83_3: Yo pana yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ na sādiyati,
anya-e1102n:83_5: Yo vā pana sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā musāvādena bhikkhuti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā bhikkhuvassaggena vandanādiṃ sādiyati,
anya-e1102n:83_6: so bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgattā liṅgatthenako na hoti,
anya-e1102n:83_8: Ettha ca ubhayatthenakopi asuddhacittena liṅgatthenakeeva paviṭṭhoti veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:83_13: Yo vā pana bhikkhupārājikamāpannova bhikkhuliṅge ṭhito yāva paṭijānāti,
anya-e1102n:83_16: tathā hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti,
anya-e1102n:83_18: omasavāde pācittiyañca na janeti teneva “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
anya-e1102n:83_19: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadati āpatti omasavādassā”ti omasavāde pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:83_21: Yo pana sāmaṇero sāmaṇeraliṅgeneva pāṇātipātādipañcavidhaṃ silavipattiṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e1102n:83_22: sopi āgato liṅganāsanāya nāsetvā saraṇasīlaṃ dātabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:83_24: Vikālabhojanādikaṃ karontassa pana “accayo maṃ bhante accāgamā”tyādinā saṅghamajjhe accayaṃ desāpetvā vā daṇḍakammaṃ vā katvā sīlaṃ dātabbameva.
anya-e1102n:84_0: Tiracchānagatoti yokoci amanussabhūto cattāro apāyikāpi upasampadāya avatthuyeva.
anya-e1102n:84_1: Te paṭisandhiyā lāmakattā abhabbā sāsane pabbajituṃ.
anya-e1102n:84_2: Yadi cattāro apāyikā upasampadāya avatthu bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:84_3: atha kasmā sese anapadisitvā tiracchānagatova avatthūti vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:84_5: tathā hi sambuddhakāle tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatto eko nāgarājā nāgayoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
anya-e1102n:84_6: Athakho tassa nāgassa etadahosi kenanukho ahaṃ upāyena nāgayoniyā parimucceyyaṃ khippañca manussattaṃ labheyyanti.
anya-e1102n:84_7: Athakho tassa nāgassa etadahosi “ime kho samaṇāsakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino
anya-e1102n:84_8: sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā sace kho ahaṃ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṃ,
anya-e1102n:84_9: evāhaṃ nāgayoniyā parimucceyyaṃ khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabheyya”nti.
anya-e1102n:84_10: Atha kho so nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
anya-e1102n:84_12: Tena kho pana samayena so nāgo aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ paccantime vihāre paṭivasati.
anya-e1102n:84_13: Atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccūṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati.
anya-e1102n:84_14: Atha kho so nāgo tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭho niddaṃ okkamesi.
anya-e1102n:84_17: Athakho so bhikkhu “vihāraṃ pavisissāmī”ti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahināpuṇṇaṃ vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante.
anya-e1102n:84_19: Bhikkhū upadhāvitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocuṃ “kissa tvaṃ āvuso vissaramakāsī”ti.
anya-e1102n:84_20: Ayaṃ āvuso sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantāti.
anya-e1102n:84_21: Atha kho so nāgo tena saddena pabujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi.
anya-e1102n:84_25: Atha kho so nāgo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesī.
anya-e1102n:84_27: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā taṃ nāgaṃ etadavoca “tumhe
anya-e1102n:84_30: tattheva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposathaṃ upavasa,
anya-e1102n:84_31: evaṃ tvaṃ nāgayoniyā parimuccissasi khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabhissasī”ti.
anya-e1102n:84_32: Atha kho so nāgo “avirūḷhadhammo kirāhaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinayeti dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno vissaraṃ katvā pakkami.
anya-e1102n:84_33: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi “dve me bhikkhave paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya.
anya-e1102n:84_34: Yadā ca sajātiyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
anya-e1102n:84_36: Ime kho bhikkhave dve paccayā nāgassa sabhāva pātukammāya.
anya-e1102n:84_39: Ettha ca pavattiyaṃ abhiṇhaṃ sabhāvapātukammadassanavasena “dve paccayā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:84_40: Nāgassa pana pañcasu kālesu sabhāvapātukammaṃ hoti paṭisandhikāle,
anya-e1102n:84_46: atha kasmā cattāro apāyikāva upasampadāya avatthūti vuttanti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e1102n:84_47: tathāpi devānaṃ abhabbattā paṭivedhasāsanassa ṭhitattā te abhabbato visuṃ karaṇatthāya evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:84_48: Vakkhati hi samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya mahāvagge “tiracchānagato bhikkhaveti ettha nāgo vā hotu
anya-e1102n:84_49: supaṇṇamāṇavakādīnaṃ vā aññataro antamaso sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya yo koci amanussajātiyo sabbova imasmiṃ
anya-e1102n:84_52: Ettha cāha yadi nāgasupaṇṇā paṭisandhiyā lāmakā bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:84_53: atha kasmā vidhurajātake cattāro janā nāgasupaṇṇasakkadhanañcayakorabyesu bhavanesu taṃ tadeva ṭhānaṃ patthentā dānādīni puññāni karonti,
anya-e1102n:84_54: tesu eko āyupariyosāne saputtadāro nāgabhavane nāgarājā hutvā nibbatti,
anya-e1102n:84_55: eko supaṇṇabhavane simbalivimāne supaṇṇarājā hutvā nibbatti,
anya-e1102n:84_57: eko dhanañcayakorabyarañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattīti catunnampi janānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ kusalakammeneva
anya-e1102n:84_59: “kusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti imissāpi paṭṭhānapāḷiyā
anya-e1102n:84_61: na panevaṃ vattabbaṃ atha kathañcidaṃ paccetabbanti. Vuccate,
anya-e1102n:84_62: nikantiyā balavattā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogattā ca aparisuddhā tesaṃ kusalacetanā,
anya-e1102n:84_64: Duggatibhūmiyaṃ pavattamānāpi kammā yūhanakāle taṃ taṃ bhūmipatthanā taṇhāsampayuttāpubbabhāgacetanā balena tesu tiracchānabhūmīsu nibbattanti,
anya-e1102n:84_69: Nikantica nāmesā balavajhānasampayuttacetanāpi paṭibāhituṃ sakkā tathā hi gopakadevadattassa ācariyasamaṇo
anya-e1102n:84_70: jhānabalena brahmabhūmīsu anibbattitvā jhānaṃ paṭibāhitvā aññakammena gandhabbadevesuyeva uppajjati “sīlavato
anya-e1102n:84_71: hi bhikkhave cetopaṇidhi samijjhati visuddhattā”ti tesaṃ vitthāro dīghanikāye āgato,
anya-e1102n:84_73: Sattavidhamethunasaṃyogavasenāpi sattā dukkhato na muccanti vuttañhi bhagavatā “idha brāhmaṇa ekacco
anya-e1102n:84_74: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvaya samāpattiṃ
anya-e1102n:84_76: api ca kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ nhāpanaṃ parimaddanaṃ sambāhanaṃ sādiyati,
anya-e1102n:84_79: Idampikho brāhmaṇabrahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampi.
anya-e1102n:84_80: Ayaṃ vuccati brāhmaṇa aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati.
anya-e1102n:84_81: Saṃyutto methunasaṃyogena na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena…pe…
anya-e1102n:84_85: Na heva kho mātugāmenasaddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e1102n:84_87: api ca kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkeḷāyati,
anya-e1102n:84_90: Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:84_91: na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ samāpajjati.
anya-e1102n:84_93: Napi mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkeḷāyati.
anya-e1102n:84_94: Apica kho mātugāmassa cakkhuṃ upanijjhāyati pekkhati,
anya-e1102n:84_97: Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇovā brāhmaṇo vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:84_101: Api ca kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃvā tiropākāraṃvā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā,
anya-e1102n:84_104: Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇo vā brahmaṇo vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:84_109: api ca kho yānitāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni anussarati.
anya-e1102n:84_112: Punaca paraṃ brāhmaṇa idhekacco samaṇo vā brahmaṇo vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:84_115: na pi yāni tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni anussarati,
anya-e1102n:84_116: api ca kho gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi sahitaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ,
anya-e1102n:84_121: napi anussarati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā paricārayamānaṃ,
anya-e1102n:84_122: api ca kho aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapenavā
anya-e1102n:84_123: brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vāti,
anya-e1102n:84_127: Idaṃ kho brāhmaṇa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampī”ti evaṃ lābhādihetukena bhedena
anya-e1102n:85_0: Mātughātake pana yena manussitthibhūtāpi ajanikā posā vanikā mātā vā mahāmātā vā cūḷamātā vā janikāpi amanussitthibhūtā mātā ghātitā,
anya-e1102n:85_3: Tiracchānitthiyopi manussapurisamāgamma manussabhūtaṃ puttaṃ vijāyanti kontaputtā dvebhātikattherā viya tepi hi aṇḍajāyeva,
anya-e1102n:85_4: tathā hi petaloke tiracchāne manusse cāti imesu tīsu bhūmīsu catasso yoniyo sambhavanti.
anya-e1102n:85_11: sā hi rañño asokadhammarājassa kāle vanacarakena labhitvā manussasaṃvāsamāgamma dve putte vijāyitvā “idāni
anya-e1102n:85_12: dārake pahāya na gamissatī”ti saññāya vanacarako tassā potthaṃ adāsi,
anya-e1102n:85_13: sā potthaṃ labhitvā pakkhanditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gatā kinnariyo hi potthaṃ vinā pakkhandituṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:85_14: teneva tāpaso “mā potthaṃ assā adāsī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:85_17: tathā hi cakkavattino vehāsagamanādi puññavato iddhināma,
anya-e1102n:85_18: na tena cakkaratanaṃ vā hatthiassaratanaṃ vā vinā attano sabhāveneva gantuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:85_19: Tattha cakkaratanaṃ rañño cakkavattissa kammabalena nibbattattā samuddamajjhe jāyamānampi kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:85_22: Kinnariyo pana potthaṃ vinā attano sabhāvena pakkhandituṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:85_24: Keci pana devānaṃ alaṅkārā viya paṭisandhiyā saha āgatoti vadanti,
anya-e1102n:85_29: saṃsedajāpi padumagabbhevā veḷugabbhe vā nibbattā pokkharasātibrāhmaṇapadumavatīveḷuvatīdevīādayo viya.
anya-e1102n:85_31: Yena sayaṃ tiracchānabhūtena manussitthibhūtā mātā ghātitā,
anya-e1102n:85_32: sopi ānantariko na hoti tiracchānagatattā panassa pabbajjā paṭikkhittā,
anya-e1102n:85_36: seyyathāpi bhūridattassa mātā itthiyo hi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti -
anya-e1102n:85_44: Tattha ajjhācārena sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā pacchimabhavikaṃ suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ bījakaṃ nāma puttaṃ vijāyi.
anya-e1102n:85_45: Kadāci ekaccā utusamaye chandarāgarattā purisānaṃ hatthagāhaveṇigāhaaṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanaṃ sādiyantiyopi gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e1102n:85_47: Udāyittherassa pana purāṇadutiyikā bhikkhunī taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ mukhena aggahesi,
anya-e1102n:85_51: Migasiṅgatāpasassa mātā migī utusamaye tāpasassa passāvaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā sasambhavaṃ pivi,
anya-e1102n:85_52: sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā migasiṅgaṃ nāma tāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi.
anya-e1102n:85_54: Sāmassa pana bodhisattassa mātā utusamaye nābhiparāmasanena gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā sāmatāpasadārakaṃ vijāyi,
anya-e1102n:85_55: evaṃ maṇḍabyassa ca caṇḍapajjo tassa ca mātā utusamaye nābhiparāmasanavasena,
anya-e1102n:85_56: tattha ca diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya nābhiparāmasanena maṇḍabyassa nibbatti ahosi.
anya-e1102n:85_57: Caṇḍapajjotassa mātu nābhiyaṃ vicchiko pharitvā gato,
anya-e1102n:85_59: Idhekaccā itthī utusamaye purisasaṃsaggaṃ alabhamānā chandarāgavasena antogehegatāva purisaṃ upanijjhāyati,
anya-e1102n:85_64: tā utusamaye meghasaddaṃ sutvā gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e1102n:85_65: Gāvīeva vā kadāci usabhagandhena gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e1102n:85_67: Evaṃ aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi itthiyo gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti.
anya-e1102n:85_69: tasmā bhūridattādayo dhataraṭṭhaṃ nāgarājānaṃ paṭicca nāgāyeva honti.
anya-e1102n:85_70: Caṇḍapajjotassa pana vicchikaṃ paṭicca manusso jāto,
anya-e1102n:86_0: Arahantaghātako pana amanussa arahantadevataṃ vā manussajātiyaṃ vā avasesaṃ ariyapuggalaṃ ghātetvā anantariyo na hoti,
anya-e1102n:86_3: Tiracchāno pana amanussaarahantampi ghātetvā ānantariko na hoti,
anya-e1102n:86_4: kammaṃ pana bhāriyaṃ tiracchānagatattā panassa pabbajjā vāritā.
anya-e1102n:87_0: Lohituppādako pana yo tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena cammaṃ chinditvā lohitaṃ paggharituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e1102n:87_1: sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati,
anya-e1102n:87_7: Yo pana jīvako viya rogavūpasamanatthaṃ phāletvā pūtimaṃsañca lohitañca nīharitvā phāsuṃ karoti,
anya-e1102n:88_1: purisavasena duvidho tattha itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthinimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ,
anya-e1102n:88_5: Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthīsu purisattaṃ karontassa itthinimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:88_7: Purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisānaṃ itthibhāvaṃ upagacchantassa purisanimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:88_11: Purisa ubhato byañjanako pana sayaṃ na gaṇhāti,
anya-e1102n:88_15: Ubhato byañjanaṃ assa atthīti viggahena “ubhatobyañja”nti vakkhatha,
anya-e1102n:88_22: tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti noti ekasmiṃ santāne indriya dvayassa paṭisevitattā.
anya-e1102n:88_32: tathā hi itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa yadā itthiyā rattaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:88_35: Yadi tesaṃ indriyadvayaṃ byañjanānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:88_36: sadā byañjana dvayaṃ ekato tiṭṭheyya na pana tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n:88_38: Byañjanakāraṇaṃ indriyaṃ pahāya rāgacittamevettha byañjanadvayassa kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:88_47: pavatte purisaliṅgaṃ nibbatī”ti paṭisandhiyaṃ liṅgasambhavo vutto,
anya-e1102n:88_54: yathā ca bīje sati rukkho sambhavati, nāsati,
anya-e1102n:88_55: evameva indriye sati liṅgādīni sambhavanti bījasadisañhi indriyaṃ,
anya-e1102n:88_56: rukkhasadisāni liṅgādīni evameva tesu puggalesu paṇḍakādayo ekādasapuggalā tasmiṃ yeva bhave niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ na arahanti,
anya-e1102n:88_59: upanissaye sati tasmiṃyeva bhave niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ arahanti,
anya-e1102n:92_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti.
anya-e1102n:93_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ apekkhitvā vā evaṃ asakkontenāpi sithiladhanita vimuttaniggahitavasena
anya-e1102n:93_1: vuttāni byañjanāni akopetvā vā duruttaṃ vā akatvā vuttaṃ ñattisampatti nāma.
anya-e1102n:93_2: Ñattivipatti nāma sabbaso ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā vā vatthusaṅghapuggalañattīnaṃ aparāmasanāni pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanañcāti ime tāva pañca ñattidosā.
anya-e1102n:93_3: Tattha ayaṃ itthanāmoti upasampadāpekkhassa api akittanaṃ vatthuaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:93_4: Suṇātu me bhante saṅghoti ettha suṇātu me bhanteti vatvā saṅghoti abhaṇanaṃ saṅghaaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:93_5: Itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkhoti upajjhāyassa akittanaṃ puggalaaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:93_6: Sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiyā anuccāraṇaṃ ñattiaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:93_7: Paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā esā ñattīti vatvā khamati saṅghassāti evaṃ ñatti kittanaṃ pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:93_8: Iti ime pañca ñattidosā ñattivipatti nāma.
anya-e1102n:93_9: Imehi dosehi vimuttāya ñattiyā sampannaṃ ñattisampatti nāma.
anya-e1102n:95_2: akāle sāvananti ime pañca anusāvanadose vajjetvā kathanaṃ anusāvanasampatti nāma.
anya-e1102n:95_4: Tīsu pana anusāvanāsu yattha katthaci etesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ aparāmasanameva.
anya-e1102n:95_5: Sabbena sabbaṃ pana kammavācaṃ avatvā catukkhattuṃ ñattikittanameva vā kammavācabbhantarepi cattāri byañjanāni
anya-e1102n:95_6: kopetvā vā akkharassa vā padassa vā duruccāraṇaṃ vā katvā sāvanaṃ sāvanāya hāpanaṃ nāma,
anya-e1102n:95_7: tathā hi sithiladhanitavimuttaniggahitavasena cattāri byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ kopenti.
anya-e1102n:95_8: Tattha “suṇātu me ti sithile vattabbe suṇāthu me”ti vacanaṃ sithile dhanitaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:95_9: “Bhante”ti vattabbe bhanteti vacanaṃ dhanite sithilaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:95_10: “Suṇātu esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “suṇantu esaṃ ñattī”ti vacanaṃ vimutte niggahitaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:95_12: Evaṃ imāni cattāri byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsenti.
anya-e1102n:95_13: Imāni cattāri akopetvā vadantenāpi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ akkharaṃ vadanto duruttaṃ karoti nāma.
anya-e1102n:95_14: Itaresu dīgharassādīsu chasu ṭhānesu dīghaṭṭhāne dīghaṃ,
anya-e1102n:95_15: rassaṭṭhāne rassamevāti evaṃ yathāṭhāne taṃ tadeva akkharaṃ bhāsantena anukkamāgataṃ paveṇiṃ avināsetvā kammavācā kātabbā.
anya-e1102n:95_16: Sace pana evaṃ akatvā dīghe vattabbe rassaṃ,
anya-e1102n:95_23: Imāni cha byañjanāni kammaṃ na kopenti.
anya-e1102n:95_25: Apare pana idāni byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsentīti vadanti,
anya-e1102n:95_29: Sāvanāya anokāse paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā anusāvanaṃ akāle sāvanaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:95_30: Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya anusāvanāya sampannaṃ anusāvanasampattisampannaṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:95_32: “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti anusāvanāya katattā kammakopo na hoti,
anya-e1102n:95_33: kārakasaṅgho pana sātisāro tenevāha vimativinodaniyampi pattacīvarānaṃ abhāvepi’paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara’nti
anya-e1102n:95_34: kammavācāya sāvitattā kammakopaṃ avatvā dukkaṭameva vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:95_40: Vakkhati hi vimativinodaniyaṃ “kammaṃ na kuppatīti idaṃ upajjhāyābhāvepi itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho
anya-e1102n:95_41: itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti matassa vā vibbhamantassa vā purāṇaupajjhāyassa vā yassa kassaci avijjamānassāpi
anya-e1102n:95_43: Yadi hi upajjhāyakittanaṃ na kareyya,’puggalaṃ na parāmasatī’ti vuttakammavipattieva siyā,
anya-e1102n:95_48: vakkhati hi vimativinodaniyaṃ “saṅghena upajjhāyenā”ti ayaṃ itthannāmo saṅghassa upasampadāpekkho,
anya-e1102n:95_50: Saṅghena upajjhāyenā”ti evaṃ kammavācāya saṅghameva upajjhāyaṃ kittetvāti attho.
anya-e1102n:95_51: Evaṃ’gaṇena upajjhāyenā’ti etthāpi ayaṃ itthannāmogaṇassa upasampadāpekkho’ti ādinā yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e1102n:95_52: Evaṃ vuttepi kammaṃ na kuppati eva,
anya-e1102n:95_54: aññathā so ca puggalo anupasampannoti vadeyyā’ti.
anya-e1102n:95_56: te vajjetvā pañcavaggādigaṇo hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā pūrati,
anya-e1102n:95_58: kārakasaṅgho pana sātisāro tena vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “paṇḍakādīhi upajjhāyehi kariyamānesu paṇḍakādikena vināva pañcavaggādigaṇo pūrati,
anya-e1102n:95_63: sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu dvīhi vā tīhi vā ācariyehi visuṃ visuṃ ekena ekassāti ekappahāreneva dve tisso vā kammavācā kātabbā.
anya-e1102n:95_70: natveva’nānupajjhāyenā’ti paṭikkhittattā na vaṭṭatīti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:95_71: Catunnaṃ pana janānaṃ vicāraṇakathāya nāpi kammavipattichāyā dissati,
anya-e1102n:95_76: pacchā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetuṃ vaṭṭati terasavatthuvimuttattā sampatti yevetthapamāṇattā ca.
anya-e1102n:97_0: Idāni sīmavisodhaniṃ nāma, nānāganthasamāhanti imissā gāthāya saṃvaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto.
anya-e1102n:101_0: Yaṃ sīmaṃ anujānāti, tattha pañho pavattati.
anya-e1102n:102_0: Dveḷhakā saṃsayā honti, dese sabbattha bhikkhavo;
anya-e1102n:104_0: Yadi me īdisaṃ vādaṃ, sutvāvupekkhako bhave;
anya-e1102n:112_0: Mā tvaṃ ānanda rodasi, mā tvaṃ ānanda socasi;
anya-e1102n:122_0: Tattha sīmavisodhani'nti sīmavipattijahanaṃ sīmavipattiṃ pahāya sampattilakkhaṇappakāsakaṃ pakaraṇaṃ karissanti attho.
anya-e1102n:122_16: Tattha khaṇḍasīmā nāma pabbajjupasampadādīnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ sukhakaraṇatthaṃ mahāsīmāya vā gāmakhette vā khaṇḍitvā paricchinditvā sammatā.
anya-e1102n:122_17: Tassāvitthāro ''paṭhamaṃ nimittā kittetabbā''ti ādinā dvāsattatippabhedāya samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya mahāvagge vutto,
anya-e1102n:122_21: Tattha sace pana heṭṭhā uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa parato anto leṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:122_23: Athāpi uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orato bahi leṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:122_24: antosīmā na otaratīti ime dve ekatthā byañjanameva nānaṃ.
anya-e1102n:122_25: Ayañhetthatthouparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orimabhāgato heṭṭhā pabbatapāde umaṅgasaṇṭhānena pabbatapasse vijjhitvā leṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:122_26: sīmāparicchedassa parato leṇe ca leṇassa bahibhūte heṭṭhā pabbate ca bhūmibhāge sīmā na otarati,
anya-e1102n:122_28: Tassa uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orimabhāgato bahibhūte heṭṭhā pabbatapāde umaṅgasaṇṭhānena vijjhitvā pabbatapasse leṇaṃ athāpi hoti,
anya-e1102n:122_29: leṇe ca leṇassa parabhūte heṭṭhā pabbate ca bhūmibhāge sīmā na otarati,
anya-e1102n:122_34: Tameva antosaddaṃ sīmāparicchedena visesetuṃ “uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa parato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:122_35: Pabbatapādaṃ pana apekkhitvā “orato”ti vattabbepi sīmānissayaṃ pabbataggaṃ sandhāya “parato”ti vuttanti
anya-e1102n:122_36: daṭṭhabbaṃ teneva bahileṇanti ettha bahisaddaṃ visesento “uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orato”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:122_37: Bahi sīmā na otaratīti ettha bahī ti pabbatapādeleṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:122_38: Leṇassa bahibhūte upari sīmāparicchedassa heṭṭhābhāge sīmā na otaratīti attho.
anya-e1102n:122_39: Antosīmāti leṇassa ca pabbatapādassa ca anto attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne na otaratīti attho.
anya-e1102n:122_41: sīmā na otaratī ti cettha attano otaraṇārahaṭṭhāne leṇabhāvena sīmā sabbathā “anotaraṇameva dassitanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:122_42: Tattha pi anotaraṇanti uparieva sīmā hotī”ti vimativinodanī.
anya-e1102n:122_43: Keci pana veḷususiro viya susirameva leṇanti vadanti,
anya-e1102n:123_0: Upacārasīmā nāma gāmāraññanigamādivasā yāva brahmalokā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ nivāsagehassa vā devavimānakapparukkhādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n:123_1: vā upacārārahaṭṭhānameva upacārasīmā te idha nādhippetā,
anya-e1102n:123_3: Yaṃ pana padesaṃ paricchinditvā pariveṇaṃ katvā pākārādiparikkhittaṃ vā katvā aparikkhittepi upacārārahaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e1102n:123_4: paricchinditvā vā yasmiṃ padese bhikkhū vasanti,
anya-e1102n:123_9: Tatruppādenā bhatanti vihārasantakena khettavatthuādinā ābhataṃ kiñci saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ uppajjati,
anya-e1102n:123_10: taṃ tesaṃ kathinatthārakabhikkhūnaṃ yeva bhavissatīti yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e1102n:123_11: Khettavatthuādinā ti ettha ādisaddena matakacīvaraṃ vā hotu saṃghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ vā saṅghikena vā ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:123_13: teneva “tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṅghaṃ uddissa vihāro kārito hoti,
anya-e1102n:123_14: so tassa vihārassa kate ubhatosaṅghassa akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmo hoti.
anya-e1102n:123_15: Tena kho pana samayena ubhatosaṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:123_16: Atha kho so upāsako saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṃ yācī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ānisaṃsapasambhanatthaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ,
anya-e1102n:123_17: teneva thullanandā bhikkhunī ānisaṃsaṃ appaṭippassambhentā cīvaraṃ amhākaṃ bhavissatīti kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhi,
anya-e1102n:123_18: tasmā kathinatthatasīmāyaṃ anuddhaṭe kathine yāva phagguṇapuṇṇamā pañca māsā etthantare matakacīvaraṃ
anya-e1102n:123_19: vā hotu cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa matānaṃ ñātijanānaṃ vā,
anya-e1102n:123_20: bhikkhāpaññattiyā vā vihāramahādikiccena vā yenakenaci ākārena saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:123_22: Chinnavassānaṃ vā pacchimikāya upagatānaṃ vā tattha sampattānaṃ sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhūnaṃ vā na hoti.
anya-e1102n:123_27: Teneva gaṇapūraṇavasena sampattānaṃ chinnaṃ vassānaṃ vā pacchimikāya upagatānaṃ vā aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassanaṃ vā khādanīyabhojanīyādīni pāpuṇanti.
anya-e1102n:123_29: Tasmiṃ vihāre asati aññavihāre baddhasīmāya vā udakukkhepasīmādīsu vā kātabbameva.
anya-e1102n:124_1: tasmiṃ vihāre purimikāya upagatā kathinatthārakusalā na honti.
anya-e1102n:124_3: Kammavācaṃ sāvetvā kathinaṃ attharāpetvā dānañca bhuñjitvā gamissanti,
anya-e1102n:124_6: Chinnavassāvā pacchimikāya upagatā vā aññasmiṃ vihāre vutthavassāpi vā purimikāya upagatānaṃ gaṇapūraṇamattameva labhanti,
anya-e1102n:124_11: Apare pana “kathinatthatasīmanti upacārasīmaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vuttattā upacārasīmāyameva kathinanatthāraka ñattiṃ karonti,
anya-e1102n:124_14: Tathā hi upacārasīmāyameva paviṭṭhagāmasīmāyaṃ tattha otiṇṇe bhikkhū tattha pāsānayanaṃ vā bahisīmakaraṇaṃ vā ko sakkhissati.
anya-e1102n:124_19: Tattha apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa
anya-e1102n:124_20: anumatiyā saṅghaṃ kittetvā “ruccati saṅghassā”ti tikkhuttuṃ anusāvetvā kattabbaṃ vuccati.
anya-e1102n:124_21: Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
anya-e1102n:124_22: Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anusāvanāyāti
anya-e1102n:124_24: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā tīhi ca anusāvanāhīti
anya-e1102n:124_25: evaṃ ñatticatutthāhi tīhi anusāvanāhi kattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
anya-e1102n:124_27: Kathinatthatasāṭakadānepi anatthateyeva kathine tato bahuānisaṃsacīvarasāṭakaṃ labhitvā teneva sāṭakena attharitabbā,
anya-e1102n:124_28: puna kammavācāya dānakiccaṃ natthi apalokanakammena saṅghassa anumatiyā dātabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:124_31: Ñattikammaṃ pana dhammasaṅgāhakakāle mahākassapattherādīhi attanāva attānaṃ sammannanakāle lahukakammeyeva labbhati.
anya-e1102n:124_37: vihāravatthudesanāti imāni cha garukammāni apaloketvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n:124_39: Ito paresu cīvaravippavāsasammutiādīsu ñattidutiyakammesu apaloketvāpi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:124_41: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ pana idāni upasampadākammaṃ idāni cattāri kammāni baddhasīmāya vā,
anya-e1102n:124_42: tasmiṃ asati udakukkhepasīmāya vā sodhetuṃ asakkonte sati abaddhasīmāya vā kātabbameva.
anya-e1102n:124_43: Apare evaṃ vadanti “kuṭivatthukāravihāravatthukārakāle tāni kuṭivihāravatthūni kathaṃ sīmaṭṭhā kātuṃ sakkhissanti,
anya-e1102n:124_48: tathā hi saṅghakuṭivatthuṃ olokentaṃ yācatityādinā vatthuparāmasanaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vatthuñattidose ca
anya-e1102n:124_49: vipatti lakkhaṇe ca vajjetvā ñattidutiyakammena sammatabhikkhūhi tattha kuṭivihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā oloketabbaṃ
anya-e1102n:124_50: teneva pāḷiyaṃ “tehi sammatehi bhikkhūhi tattha gantvā kuṭivatthu oloketabba”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:124_51: Aññathā pattacīvaravirahitaṃ puggalaṃ vā anupajjhāyakaṃ vā katvā upasampādentehi “paripuṇṇassa pattacīvara”nti vā “itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho,
anya-e1102n:124_52: itthannāmena upajjhāyenā”ti kammavācāya sāvitepi kammassa asijjhanaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e1102n:124_54: tathā hi sīmāsammutikāle bhikkhū tasmiṃ yeva ṭhāne ṭhatvā kammavācaṃ sāventi,
anya-e1102n:124_57: sīmajjhottharaṇaṃ vā sīmasambhedo vā siyā”ti. Saccaṃ,
anya-e1102n:124_58: tathāpi taṃ sīmāsammutiṭṭhānaṃ bhujissaṃ katvā sīmasammutikammassakatattā visuṃgāme sammatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1102n:124_59: gāmasīme ṭhitā bhikkhū kammaṃ kopetuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:124_60: Yadi sīmasammutiṭṭhānaṃ bhujissaṃ katvāva sīmaṃ sammanneyya,
anya-e1102n:124_61: kathaṃ bhagavato dharamānakāle chabbaggiyā bhikkhu yathāsukhaṃ sīmaṃ sammannissantīti na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ
anya-e1102n:124_62: tathā hi vāsākhā migāramātāpi navakoṭīhi bhūmiṃ gaṇhitvā pubbārāmaṃ nāma mahā vihāraṃ kāresi,
anya-e1102n:124_63: tathā anāthapiṇḍiko kahāpaṇasanthatena jetassa rājakumārassa uyyānaṭṭhānaṃ kiṇāpetvā gaṇhitvā jetavanaṃ
anya-e1102n:124_64: nāma mahāvihāraṃ kāresi evaṃ puññakāmā pariveṇaṃ katvā vihāraṃ karonti tasmā chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yathāsukhaṃ
anya-e1102n:125_0: Samānasaṃvāsasīmā nāma diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅghātasaṅkhātehi bhikkhugaṇehi uposathādisaṅghakammena samānaṃ ekībhāvaṃ hutvā vasituṃ sammatā sīmā.
anya-e1102n:125_1: Avippavāsasīmā nāma ticīvarena vippavasituṃ sammatā sīmā,
anya-e1102n:125_2: etā dvesīmā tiyojanaparamatāyapi sambhavato mahāsīmā tipi nāmaṃ labhanti,
anya-e1102n:125_3: tāsaṃ vicāraṇā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sabbaso paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttā,
anya-e1102n:125_4: tasmā idha na vakkhāma vuccamānampi avisesetvā vuttaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:126_0: Lābhasīmā nāma yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā pokkharaṇītaḷākavanādikaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ saṅghassa catuccappayatthāya
anya-e1102n:126_6: Mātikāṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsaniyampi lābhasīmāti yaṃ rājarājamahāmattādayo vihāraṃ kāretvā gāvutaṃ
anya-e1102n:126_7: vā aḍḍhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā samantā paricchinditvā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ vihārassa lābhasīmā,
anya-e1102n:126_9: taṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ vihārassa demā”ti ṭhapenti,
anya-e1102n:126_11: Imasmiṃ lābhasīmādhikāre rañño mahācetiyadāyakassa divaṅgatakālato ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare atīte tassa jeṭṭhaputtassa
anya-e1102n:126_13: Yadi hi rājarājamahāmattādīsu yo koci yassa vihārassa yāni taḷākakhettavatthādīni datvā taṃ sahitavihāraṃ puggalassa deti,
anya-e1102n:126_14: evaṃ sati kiṃ tassa puggalassa taṃ sahitavihāraṃ puggalikabhāvena paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e1102n:126_15: udāhu saṅghikabhāvenevāti taḷākakhettavatthādivirahito pana kevalo puggalikavihāro aññesaṃ dammīti adatvā puggale mate saṅghiko hoti,
anya-e1102n:126_18: yadi hi rājarājamahāmattādīsu yokoci vihārassa taḷākakhettāvatthādīni deti,
anya-e1102n:126_19: evaṃ sati paṭikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭatītidaṭṭhabbaṃ tena vuttaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “imaṃ taḷākaṃ,
anya-e1102n:126_21: imaṃ vatthuṃ vihārassa demāti vutte paṭikkhipituṃ na labbhatī”ti.
anya-e1102n:129_4: tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ vihārassa demāti saṅghikavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:129_5: “Pāsādassā”ti ca sāmaññena vuttepi “tena kho pana samayena visākhā migāramātā saṅghassa atthāya sāḷindaṃ
anya-e1102n:129_6: pāsādaṃ kārāpetukāmo hoti hatthinakhaka”nti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ pāsādaparibhogassa anuññātattā saṅghikaṃyeva
anya-e1102n:129_7: pāsādaṃ sandhāya vuttanti viññāyati tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga’nti.
anya-e1102n:129_8: Pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya vaṇṇanādhikāre “suvaṇṇarajatādivicitrānī”tiādi saṅghikasenāsanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

anya-e1102n:129_12: “Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammavinayavaṇṇanaṭṭhāne”ti vuttattā saṅghikameva suvaṇṇādimayaṃ senāsanaṃ senāsanaparikkhārā ca vaṭṭanti,
anya-e1102n:129_16: Sace pana rājarājamahāmattādīsu yokoci taḷākakhettavatthādisahitaṃ vihāraṃ puggalassa taṃ sahitavihārabhāvamārocetvā deti,

anya-e1102n:129_28: tathā hi vuttaṃ vimativinodaniyaṃ “cattāropaccaye paribhuñjatūti deti vaṭṭatītiettha bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e1102n:129_29: catupaccayaparibhogatthāya taḷākaṃ dammīti vā bhikkhusaṅgho cattāro paccaye paribhuñjituṃ taḷākaṃ dammīti
anya-e1102n:129_30: vā ito taḷākato uppanne cattāro paccaye dammīti vā vuttampi vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n:129_32: puggalassa pana evampi dinnaṃ taḷākakhettādi na vaṭṭati.

anya-e1102n:129_39: Evañcakatvā vimativinodaniyaṃ “khettavatthādīnipi kappiyavohārenāpi puggalānaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati,

anya-e1102n:129_41: puggalikavasena gahaṇe ananuññāte taditarānaṃ tathāgahetabbatā siddhāva hotī’ti vuttaṃ,

anya-e1102n:130_0: Taḷākakhettavatthādivirahitaṃ pana vihāraṃ puggalikabhāvenāpi paṭiggahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n:130_1: So ca vihāro tasmiṃ puggale jīvante puggaliko hoti.
anya-e1102n:130_2: Aññesaṃ dammīti adatvā mate avissajjanīyo avebhaṅgiyo,

anya-e1102n:130_9: Yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍaṃgaruparikkhāraṃ taṃ āgatānāgatassa cātuddisassa saṅghassa avissajjiyaṃ avebhaṅgiyanti.
anya-e1102n:130_11: mate saṅghikoyevāti aññesaṃ adatvā ṭhapitaparikkhārāpi tattha saṅghasseva honti.
anya-e1102n:131_0: Ettha ca yaṃ tattha garubhaṇḍa’nti ādīsu garubhaṇḍaṃ nāma rāsivasena pañcavidhaṃ,

anya-e1102n:135_9: Taṃ pana vihāraṃ attano rucitassa yassakassaci puggalassa “imaṃ vihāraṃ tuyhaṃ dammi,

anya-e1102n:135_13: “Khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”ti ādinā yaṃ khettādivatthupaṭiggahaṇaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ,

anya-e1102n:135_16: puggalassa paṭiggahaṇe vā paribhutte vā doso natthi,

anya-e1102n:135_22: Aññathā puggale antovihāre nisinnoyeva saṅgho tasmiṃ yeva vihārasīme kammaṃ karontopi kammakopo na bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:135_23: avaggārahattāti vakkhati ca sāratthadīpaniyaṃ “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti vacanato
anya-e1102n:135_24: puggalikepi senāsane se nāsanaparibhogavasena niyamitaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭādikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭamānampi
anya-e1102n:135_25: kevalaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti,
anya-e1102n:135_26: imināpi vacanena puggalikavihārassapi sabbakappiyabhāvo viññāyati “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti ñāpakassa dassanato.

anya-e1102n:135_34: sabbasaddassa dassanato tenevāha samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya “senāsane pana dvārakavāṭa vātapānakavāṭādīsu
anya-e1102n:135_36: Senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi aññatra viruddhasenāsanā”ti,
anya-e1102n:135_37: iminā ṭhapetvā’gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā’ti ettha viruddhasenāsanaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbakappiyākappiyaṃ vihārassa kappati,
anya-e1102n:138_0: Nanuca vihārassa demāti saṅghikavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti vimativinodaniyaṃ vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:138_1: Vuttaṃ ettha hi ācariyassaadhippāyena bhavitabbaṃ “khettavattādīnipuggalikavihārassa demā”ti vutte “na kappati upāsakā”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:138_4: evaṃ sati ca “khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”ti ādinā vuttasikkhāpadena kāretabbataṃ āpajjati.
anya-e1102n:138_6: Kasmā so puggalo tassa saṅghikavihārassa anissaro.
anya-e1102n:138_7: Cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā padesaṃ acchinditvā gaṇhantassapi pārājiko na hoti,
anya-e1102n:138_8: sabbasseva cātuddisikassa saṅghassa dhuranikkhepassa asambhavato tasmā saṅghikavihārassa dinne paṭikkhitte saṅghassa lābhantarāyakaro hotīti.
anya-e1102n:138_9: Imamevatthaṃ sandhāya vihārassa demāti saṅghikavihāraṃ sandhāya vutta’nti vuttaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:138_11: Evañca sati sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepenā’ti ettha ekassa santake taḷāke khette ca jāte tasseva dhuranikkhepena pārājikaṃ.

anya-e1102n:138_18: tathā hi khettavatthādisahitassa vihārassa puggalikabhāvena akappiye sati.
anya-e1102n:138_20: evañca pana vadeyya “dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti ettha ekassa santake taḷāke khette cātiettha gihisantakameva sandhāya vutta”nti.
anya-e1102n:138_22: Kasmā “dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti yadā pana sāmiko ayaṃ thaddho kakkhaḷo,
anya-e1102n:138_24: alaṃ dāni mayhaṃ iminā”ti padassa dissanato teneva “khettāni pāṭipuggalikāni,
anya-e1102n:138_26: Tathā “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbaṃ pāsādaparibhoga”nti vacanato puggalikepi senāsane senāsanaparibhogavasena
anya-e1102n:138_27: niyamitaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭādikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭamānampi kevalaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ
anya-e1102n:138_28: na vaṭṭatī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vutta vacanenāpi avirodho siyā,
anya-e1102n:138_29: tathā “senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi aññatra viruddhasenāsananā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanenāpi saṃsandameva.
anya-e1102n:138_30: Tathā “yaṃ bhikkhave mayā idaṃ na kappatīti appaṭikkhittaṃ,
anya-e1102n:138_34: Kathaṃ “anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcaleṇāni vihārantyā”dinā anuññātavihārassa paṭiggahitatthā.

anya-e1102n:138_38: puggalikabhāvenāpi paṭiggahetabboti kappiyā kappiyāni vinayakovidehi daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e1102n:140_0: Ayaṃ pañhā saṅghikabhūmithenake bhikkhu sandhāya vuttā,

anya-e1102n:141_1: Tāsaṃ pana viseso evaṃ veditabbo yasmiṃ pana padese āpaṇameva atthi,

anya-e1102n:144_4: Tattha yaṃ padesaṃ asammatāya bhikkhave sīmāya aṭhapitāya yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati,

anya-e1102n:145_0: Abbhantarasīmā nāma yaṃ paṭapadesaṃ agāmake bhikkhave araññe samantā sattabbhantarā,
anya-e1102n:145_1: ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā’ti anuññātā abbhantarasīmā nāma.
anya-e1102n:145_2: Tattha samantā sattabbhantarāti yasmiṃ viñjhāṭavisadise araññe bhikkhu vasati,
anya-e1102n:145_3: athassa ṭhitokāsato samantā puratthimāya sattabbhantarā pacchimāya sattabbhantarā dakkhiṇāya sattabbhantarā
anya-e1102n:145_6: dakkhiṇuttaravasenapi cuddasabbhantarāti evaṃ nibbedhena cuddasa cuddasa katvā samantā aṭṭhavīsati abbhantarā honti.
anya-e1102n:145_7: Ettha ca ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ aṭṭhavīsati hatthappamāṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:145_9: evaṃ dakkhiṇuttarapacchimesupīti sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā caturāsītisattasatahatthappamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:145_10: Parimaṇḍalavasena pana sabbaṃ chasattatiekasatuttarāni ca ekaṃ sahassañca hoti.
anya-e1102n:148_0: Vuttattā ayanavasena vinibbedhe cuddasabbhantare dvehatthādhikaaṭṭhasattati hoti.
anya-e1102n:148_1: Sabbaṃ aṭṭhavīsati abbhantaraṃ sampiṇḍetvā catuhatthādhikachappaññāsuttara ekasataṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:148_3: usabhavasena pana vinibbedhena cuddasa abbhantare dvehi ūnāni cattāri usabhāni ca dveratanañca honti.
anya-e1102n:148_4: Sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsatiyā abbhantare caturatanañca soḷasa ayanāni adhikāni satta usabhāni honti.
anya-e1102n:148_5: Parimaṇḍalavasena pana charatanañca cuddasaayanāni ca adhikāni ekādasa usabhāni honti.
anya-e1102n:148_7: Keci pana abbhantarasaddaṃ hattharatanavācakaṃ parikappetvā evaṃ vadanti majjhe ṭhitassa samantā satta
anya-e1102n:148_8: vinibbedhena cuddasā’ti vuttattā puratthimāya satta hatthā dakkhiṇuttarapacchimesupi satta satta hatthāti
anya-e1102n:148_9: katvā evaṃ nibbedhena cuddasa hatthā honti.
anya-e1102n:148_10: Sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsatihatthaṃ abbhantaranti taṃ tesaṃ matimattameva,
anya-e1102n:148_12: Kasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tattha ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ aṭṭhavīsatihattha’nti vuttattā.
anya-e1102n:148_13: Yadi tesaṃ matena sabbaṃ sampiṇḍetvā aṭṭhavīsatihatthabbhantaraṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:148_14: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tattha abbhantaraṃ nāma aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e1102n:148_15: majjhe ṭhitassa samantā sattavinibbedhena cuddasā hontī’ti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:148_18: Tattha ayañhetthattho tattha tatthā’ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ.
anya-e1102n:148_22: Aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇanti paricchinditabbadhammasamudāyaniddeso tattha tesu samantā sattabbhantaresu
anya-e1102n:148_23: ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ nāma aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇaṃ hotīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e1102n:148_26: Tattha parimāṇa saṅkhyā evaṃ veditabbā catasso muṭṭhiyo eko kuḍuvo.
anya-e1102n:148_34: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana nava vāhasahassānīti ettha catasso muṭṭhiyo kuḍuvo,
anya-e1102n:148_41: Tadeva ekaṃ sakaṭanti suttanipātaṭṭhakathādīsu vutta’nti vatvā “idha pana dve sakaṭāni eko vāhoti vadantī”ti
anya-e1102n:148_42: likhitaṃ paccantavohārena minite pana saṭṭhisataṃ eko vāhoti rañño dhammāsokassa sūvakāhatasāliyā minite
