anya-e1102n:290_0: “Satta satta gginā vārā, aṭṭhame aṭṭhame dakā;
anya-e1102n:291_0: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā.
anya-e1102n:294_0: Tasmā tiṇṇampi paṭhamajjhānatalānaṃ ekakappepi avināsābhāvato sakalakappe tesaṃ sambhavo natthīti asaṅkhyeyya
anya-e1102n:294_2: Dutiyajjhānatalato paṭṭhāya pana paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e1102n:294_4: Yadi dutiyajjhānatalato paṭṭhāya paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo siyā,
anya-e1102n:294_5: kathaṃ ābhassarādīsu brahmūnaṃ aṭṭhamahākappādivasena āyu paripuṇṇaṃ siyā,
anya-e1102n:294_6: tathā hi paṭhamajjhānatalaṃ sattasu vāresu agginā vinassati.
anya-e1102n:294_7: Aṭṭhame vāre yāva ābhassarā udakena vinassati puna sattavāresu agginā paṭhamajjhānatalaṃ,
anya-e1102n:294_8: puna aṭṭhamevāre udakena dutiyajjhānatalaṃ vinassatīti evaṃ aṭṭhame vāre āpavāraṃ paṭibāhitvā yāva subhakiṇhā
anya-e1102n:294_9: vātena vinassati evaṃ catusaṭṭhi paripuṇṇā hotīti saccaṃ,
anya-e1102n:294_10: heṭṭhāvivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena eko satta mahākappāni cāti aṭṭha kappāni ābhassarabrahmūnaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:294_11: Catusaṭṭhikappesupi vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappavasena eko te saṭṭhimahākappāni cāti catusaṭṭhikappāni
anya-e1102n:294_12: subhakiṇhānaṃ brahmūnaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti tena vuttaṃ porāṇehi.
anya-e1102n:295_0: Satta satta’gginā vārā, aṭṭhame aṭṭhame dakā;
anya-e1102n:296_0: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā’ti.
anya-e1102n:300_0: Imissā gāthāya “ābhassarāti”ca “subhakiṇhato”ti ca “vehapphalato”ti ca abhividhivasena vuttabhāvañca
anya-e1102n:300_1: samatalabhāvepi seṭṭhabhūmittā paṭṭhānavasena vuttabhāvañca amaññitvā suddhāvāsabhūmīsu viya uparūparivasena
anya-e1102n:301_0: “Pañcabhūmi naṭṭhā aggi, aṭṭha bhūmi naṭṭhā dakā;
anya-e1102n:302_0: Navabhūmi naṭṭhā vātā, lokanaṭṭhā tadā siyuṃ.
anya-e1102n:303_0: Paṭhame aggi dvattiṃsa, dutiye ādi soḷasa;
anya-e1102n:304_0: Dutiyabhūme majjhe aṭṭhamaṃ, taṃ chappaññāsa vārakaṃ.
anya-e1102n:307_0: Vadanti tesaṃ vāde ābhassarato heṭṭhā pañcabhūmi agginaṭṭhā,
anya-e1102n:307_2: Samataladīpanatthaṃ sandehacchedanatthaṃ evaṃ gahitāti ekabhavapariyosānaṃ sandhāya paṭisandhibhavañcāti ādi vuttanti.
anya-e1102n:307_3: Imissāpi atthaṃ duggahitena gahetvā paṭisandhibhavaṅgavasena sadisabhāvameva sandhāya vuttanti parikappenti
anya-e1102n:307_4: so ayuttarūpo viya dissati ativiya micchāgāho ca hoti aggaññasuttavisuddhimaggādīhi virujjhanato saṃvaṭṭasīmāpi
anya-e1102n:307_7: catutthajjhānatalaṃ upādāya vātena vinassatīti vuttavacanenāpi virujjhateva tasmā “ābhassarā”ti ca “subhakiṇhato”ti
anya-e1102n:307_9: Aññathā “upari pabbatā devo vassatī”ti ettha viya ābhassarasubhakiṇhavehapphalānaṃ tena tena saṃvaṭṭena vināsopi na bhaveyya.
anya-e1102n:307_11: Evaṃ buddho ca dullabho loke ti imassa attho vuttoyeva.
anya-e1102n:311_0: Idāni “saddhammasavanampi cāti imassa saṃvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tattha saddhammasavanampi ca loke dullabhameva tathā hi saddhammo nāma tividho hoti.
anya-e1102n:311_5: Paṭipattisaddhammo nāma terasadhutaṅgāni asīti khandhakavattādayo abhisamācāravattādīni.
anya-e1102n:311_7: Tesu pariyattisaddhammo dvinnaṃ saddhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamoyeva padaṭṭhānañca.
anya-e1102n:311_8: Kasmā taṃmūlakattā tathā hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho nāma natthi.
anya-e1102n:311_11: Kiṃ kāraṇā ayañhi pariyatti paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti.
anya-e1102n:311_13: Tattha paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi nahotipi.
anya-e1102n:311_14: Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhadharā bhikkhū bahū honti,
anya-e1102n:311_15: “esa bhikkhu puthujjano”ti aṅguliṃ paharitvā dassetabbo hoti.
anya-e1102n:311_16: Imasmiṃ yeva dīpe ekavāraṃ puthujjanabhikkhunāma nāhosi.
anya-e1102n:311_17: Paṭipattipūrakāpi kadāci bahū honti kadāci appā.
anya-e1102n:311_18: Iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi.
anya-e1102n:311_19: Sāsanassa ṭhitiyā pana pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti,
anya-e1102n:311_20: yathā amhākaṃ bodhisatto āḷārassa santike pañca abhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samāpattiyā parikammaṃ pucchi.
anya-e1102n:311_22: Tato udakassa santikaṃ gantvā adhigatavisesaṃ saṃsanditvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ pucchi.
anya-e1102n:311_24: tassa vacanasamanantarameva mahāsatto taṃ sampādesi evameva paññavā bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti
anya-e1102n:311_25: tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti yathā mahātaḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakaṃ na ṭhassatīti
anya-e1102n:311_26: na vattabbaṃ udake sati padumādīni pupphāni na pupphissantīti na vattabbaṃ evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise
anya-e1102n:311_27: tepiṭake buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:311_28: Tesu sati mahātaḷākesu padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:311_29: ekantato pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipaṭivedhānaṃ antaradhānato.
anya-e1102n:311_30: Tattha pariyattināma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sāṭṭhakathā pāḷiyāva sā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n:311_32: Gacchante kāle kaliyugarājāno adhammikā honti tesu adhammikesu rājāmaccādayo adhammikā honti tathā raṭṭhajanapadavāsinopi
anya-e1102n:311_33: adhammikā etesaṃ adhammikatāya na devo sammā vassati,
anya-e1102n:311_35: Tesu sampajjantesu paccayadāyakā bhikkhusaṅghassa paccaye dātuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:311_36: Bhikkhū paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike saṅgahetuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:311_40: Tato kāle gacchante pāḷimpi sakalaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkonti paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n:311_41: Parihāyamānaṃ matthakato paṭṭhāya pariyatti hāyati paṭhamañhi mahāpakaraṇaṃ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n:311_46: dhammasaṅgahoti evaṃ abhidhammapiṭake parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṃ parihāyati.
anya-e1102n:311_49: tato ekanipātoti evaṃ aṅguttare parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyo parihāyati,
anya-e1102n:311_54: sagāthāvaggoti evaṃ saṃyuttanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya majjhimanikāyo parihāyati paṭhamañhi uparipaṇṇāsako parihāyati.
anya-e1102n:311_56: tato mūlapaṇṇāsakoti evaṃ majjhimanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya dīghanikāyo parihāyati,
anya-e1102n:311_58: tato khandhakavaggoti dīghanikāye parihīne suttantapiṭakaṃ parihīnaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e1102n:311_61: Lābhakāmā pana suttante kathitepi sallakkhentā natthīti jātakameva dhārenti.
anya-e1102n:311_62: Gacchante kāle jātakampi dhāretuṃ na sakkonti.
anya-e1102n:311_67: Gacchante kāle tampi matthakato parihāyati paṭhamañhi parivāro parihāyati,
anya-e1102n:311_68: tato khandhako bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo mahāvibhaṅgoti anukkamena uposathakkhandhakamattameva dhārenti,
anya-e1102n:311_72: Yadā saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā “buddhehi kathitaṃ
anya-e1102n:311_73: catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ jānanto imaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhatū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṃ alabhitvā ekavāraṃ
anya-e1102n:311_75: yāva tatiyaṃ carāpetvā gaṇhakaṃ alabhitvā rājapurisā sahassatthavikaṃ puna rājakulaṃ pavesenti,
anya-e1102n:311_77: Evaṃ pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭipattipi paṭivedhopi antarahitova hoti.
anya-e1102n:311_78: Saddhammasavanassa dullabhabhāvo dhammasoṇḍakavatthunā dīpetabbo amhākaṃ kira sammāsambuddho kassapasammāsambuddhassa
anya-e1102n:311_79: dhammarājassa sāsanantaradhānato nacireneva kālena bārāṇasirañño putto dhammasoṇḍakarājakumāro hutvā
anya-e1102n:311_80: pituaccayena rajje patiṭṭhāya kassapadasabalena desitaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmo hutvā māsamattaṃ rajjaṃ katvā
anya-e1102n:311_81: amhākaṃ sammāsambuddho imasmiṃ yeva bhaddakappe rajjaṃ kāretvā devanagarasadise bārāṇasinagare cakkavattirajjasadisaṃ
anya-e1102n:311_83: “mayhaṃ evarūpaṃ rajjaṃ kiṃ vilāsaṃ rajjānubhāvaṃ saddhammaviyogena,
anya-e1102n:311_89: catuakkharaniyamitadhammadesanāviyogena mayhaṃ idaṃ rajjaṃ na sobhatī”ti cintetvā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena
anya-e1102n:311_90: sahassatthavikaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ susajjitaṃ maṅgalahatthikumbhe ṭhapetvā bārāṇasīnagare mahāvīthiyaṃ bheriṃ
anya-e1102n:311_91: carāpeti “ekapadikaṃ vā dvipadikaṃ vā tipadikaṃ vā catuppadikaṃ vā dhammapadaṃ jānantassa dammī”ti evaṃ
anya-e1102n:311_92: bheriṃ carāpetvā dhammajānanakaṃ alabhitvā punappunaṃ dvisahassaṃ tisahassaṃ yāva satasahassaṃ koṭi dve
anya-e1102n:311_95: Pariyosāne dhammadesakaṃ alabhitvā attano suvaṇṇapīṭhakaṃ setacchattaṃ cajitvāpi dhammadesakaṃ alabhitvā
anya-e1102n:311_96: rajjasiriṃ pahāya attānaṃ cajitvā “dhammadesakassa dāso hutvāpi dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti vatvā evampi dhamma
anya-e1102n:311_97: desakaṃ alabhitvā vippaṭisārī hutvā “kiṃ me saddhammaviyogena rajjenāti amaccānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyātetvā saddhammagavesako
anya-e1102n:311_98: hutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā mahāvanaṃ pāvisi dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa saddhammasavanaṃ sandhāya paviṭṭhakkhake
anya-e1102n:311_99: sakkadevamahārājassa vejayantapāsādo saheva kiṇṇikāya kampo ahosi,
anya-e1102n:311_101: Sakkodevarājā kenakāraṇena paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ ahosī”ti cintetvā attano sahassanettena devamanussesu
anya-e1102n:311_102: vitthāretvā olokento dhammagavesako hutvā vanaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ dhammasoṇḍakamahārājānaṃ disvā cintesi…
anya-e1102n:311_103: “ajja me attānampi jahāya rakkhasavesaṃ māpetvā etaṃ aniccaparidīpanaṃ jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṃ sakalasarīre
anya-e1102n:311_104: dosaṃ dassetvā dhammaṃ desetvā etaṃ sakarajjeyeva patiṭṭhāpetabba”nti cintetvā sakko devarājā yakkhasarūpaṃ
anya-e1102n:311_105: māpetvā bodhisattassa abhimukho avidūre attānaṃ dassesi.
anya-e1102n:311_108: cintetvā avidūre ṭhāne ṭhatvā pucchāmīti rakkhasena saddhiṃ sallapanto āha “sāmipuññadevarāja imasmiṃ
anya-e1102n:311_109: pana vanaghane vasanakadevarājā kiṃ nukho dhammaṃ jānāsī”ti,
anya-e1102n:311_114: tvaṃ mayhaṃ kīdisaṃ dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ karissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:311_115: “Evaṃ sante mayhaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā pacchā mayhaṃ sarīre maṃsaṃ khādissasī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:311_116: “Ahaṃ mahārāja chāto hutvā dhammaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkomī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:311_119: Puna so rakkhaso “nāhaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ sakkomī”ti.
anya-e1102n:311_120: Puna rājā “mayhaṃ dhammapaṭilābhañca tumhākaṃ maṃsapaṭilābhañca tumhe jānitvā mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desethā”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:311_121: Atha sakko devarājā “sādhu hothā”ti vatvā avidūre ṭhāne ubbedhena tigāvutamattaṃ mahantaṃ añjanapabbataṃ māpetvā evamāha…
anya-e1102n:311_122: “sace mahārāja imaṃ pabbatamuddhaniṃ ārūyha ākāsā uppatitvā tvaṃ mama mukhe patissasi,
anya-e1102n:311_124: evaṃ sante tuyhañca dhammappalābho mayhañca maṃsapaṭilābho bhavissatī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:311_125: Tassa kathaṃ sutvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājā “anamatagge saṃsāre puriso hutvā adhammasamaṅgī hutvā adhammasseva
anya-e1102n:311_126: atthāya pāṇātipāto adinnādāno kāmesumicchācāro sūkariko orabbhiko sākuṇi ko coro paradāriko taṃ gahetvā
anya-e1102n:311_127: sīsacchinnānaṃ lohitaṃ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakatopi bahutaraṃ mātāpituādīnampi manāpānaṃ atthāya rodantānaṃ
anya-e1102n:311_129: imaṃ pana sarīraṃ dhammassa atthāya vikkiṇāmi taṃ mahapphalañca manāpañcā”ti cintetvā “sādhu mārisa evaṃ
anya-e1102n:311_130: karomī”ti pabbataṃ ārūyha pabbatagge ṭhito “mama rajjena saddhiṃ mayhaṃ sajīvasarīraṃ saddhammassatthāya
anya-e1102n:311_131: dassāmī”ti somanasso hutvā “dhammaṃ kathethā”ti saddhammatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā ākāsato uppatitvā
anya-e1102n:311_133: Atha sakko devarājā sakattabhāvena sabbālaṅkārehi paṭimaṇḍito ativiya sotuṃ somanasso ākāsato patantaṃ
anya-e1102n:311_134: dibbaphassena parāmasanto urena paṭiggaṇhitvā devalokaṃ netvā paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisīdāpetvā mālāgandhādīhi
anya-e1102n:311_135: pūjetvā dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha.
anya-e1102n:314_0: Evaṃ sakko dhammasoṇḍakamahārājassa dhammaṃ desetvā devalokasampattiṃ dassetvā devalokato ānetvā sakarajje
anya-e1102n:314_1: patiṭṭhāpetvā appamādena ovaditvā devalokameva agamāsi evaṃ saddhammasavanassāpi dullabhabhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e1102n:314_3: Ettha ca tīṇi parinibbānāni veditabbāni katamāni tīṇi parinibbānāni.
anya-e1102n:314_8: bhagavā hi bodhimaṇḍeyeva vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇapharasuṃ
anya-e1102n:314_14: saṅkhepato vā pañca kilesaabhisaṅkhārakhandhamaccudevaputtamāre asesato hatā vihatā anabhāvaṃkatā tasmā
anya-e1102n:314_15: sabbepi kilesā bodhimaṇḍeyeva nibbānaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchantīti kilesanibbānaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva hoti ettha
anya-e1102n:314_16: ca bodhīti arahattamaggaññāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ tathā hi sabbesampi buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṃ arahattamaggakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e1102n:314_17: sabbepi kilesā asesaṃ nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchanti tepi buddhā ugghaṭitaviññūvibhajjitaññūneyyavasena
anya-e1102n:316_0: Tatiyo neyyo nāmena, bodhisatto tidhā mato.
anya-e1102n:319_0: Mato neyyo saddhādhiko nāma, bodhisattā ime tayo;
anya-e1102n:323_0: Aṭṭhame ca asaṅkhyeyye, kappe ca satasahasse;
anya-e1102n:326_0: Neyyo tu bodhisatto ca, soḷase asaṅkhyeyye.
anya-e1102n:329_0: Suttanipātaapadānaṭṭhakathāsu pana “buddhānaṃ ānanda heṭṭhimaparicchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca,
anya-e1102n:329_3: Eteca paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena veditabbāti vuttaṃ tesu paññādhiko cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca,
anya-e1102n:329_6: Tattha paññādhiko yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu saṃsarantopi paññābahullavasena sampannajjhāsaya sambhavato khippaññeva tassa sambodhi.
anya-e1102n:329_11: rājā passenadīkosalo yathā so hi sabbaññubuddhe dharamāneyeva agamanīyampi paradāraṃ gantuṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā
anya-e1102n:329_12: paraṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ āraddho nerayikānaṃ viravantānaṃ du- sa- na-
anya-e1102n:329_13: soti saddampi sutvā ativimūḷho sabbaññubuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṃ pucchitvā tassa vacanena
anya-e1102n:329_14: sabbajanānaṃ yaññatthāya dukkhaṃ uppādesi ko panavādo anuppanne buddhe,
anya-e1102n:329_15: tathā hi esa kassapabhagavato sāsanantaradhānena andhabhūte loke bārāṇasiyaṃ rājā hutvāpi nigrodharukkhadevatāya
anya-e1102n:329_16: yaññatthāya ekasatarājāno mahesīhi saddhiṃ māretuṃ āraddho.
anya-e1102n:329_18: tasmā tassa sambodhi atimandoti evaṃ paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena kālassāpi rassadīghabhāvo veditabboti.
anya-e1102n:329_20: Khandhaparinibbānaṃ pana kusinārāya upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare vesākhapuṇṇamadivase
anya-e1102n:329_22: mahāvipākacittena abyākatena carimakaṃ katvā katthaci bhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa anantarapaccayo hutvā
anya-e1102n:329_23: kammataṇhākilesehi anupādāno sabbupadhipaṭinissaggo upādinnakakkhandhapariccāgo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:329_24: Vitthāro pana dīghanikāye mahāvagge mahāparinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ oloketabbo.
anya-e1102n:329_25: Tattha videsaṃ gacchanto puriso sabbaṃ ñātijanaṃ āliṅgetvā sīse cumbitvā gacchati viya bhagavāpi nibbānapuraṃ
anya-e1102n:329_26: pavisanto sabbepi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattiyo anavasesaṃ samāpajjitvā yāva saññāvedayitaṃ,
anya-e1102n:329_27: tatopi vuṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyi.
anya-e1102n:329_28: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī”ti vuttaṃ tattha dve samanantarā jhānasamanantarā,
anya-e1102n:329_30: Tattha jhānā vuṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ jhānasamanantaraṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:329_31: Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā puna jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ paccavekkhaṇasamanantaraṃ nāma.
anya-e1102n:329_32: Bhagavā pana jhānasamanantarā apari nibbāyittā paccavekkhaṇasamanantarameva parinibbāyīti veditabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:329_33: tenevāha “bhagavā pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyī”ti.
anya-e1102n:329_34: Ettha bhagavato parinibbānacittassa kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ kammaṃ vā hoti,
anya-e1102n:334_0: Imissāgāthāya “yaṃ yo muni anejo santi nibbānaṃ ārabbha kālaṃ akarī”ti yojetvā bhagavato parinibbānacittassa nibbānārammaṇanti tamayuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:334_1: paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutīnaṃ nibbānārammaṇassa anārahattā “nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa maggassa ārammaṇapaccayenapaccayo,
anya-e1102n:334_2: nibbānaṃ phalassa āvajjanāyā”ti paṭṭhānapāḷiyā javanaāvajjanānameva adhippetattā tasmā ettha “yaṃ yo
anya-e1102n:334_3: muni phalasamāpattiyā anejo anejasaṅkhāto taṇhārahito santiṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha ārammaṇaṃ katvā kālaṃ asītivassaparimāṇaṃ
anya-e1102n:334_6: “katthaci pana anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa yathopaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva cutipariyosānānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, na kamma-
anya-e1102n:334_7: kammanimittādayo”ti vuttattā kammanittagatinimittāni arahato cuticittassa ārammaṇabhāvaṃ na gacchantīti
anya-e1102n:334_8: tampi ayuttameva ayañhetthattho katthaci pana bhave anuppajjamānassa khīṇāsavassa arahato yathā yathā
anya-e1102n:334_9: yena yena pakārena upaṭṭhitaṃ nāmarūpadhammādikameva cutipariyosānaṃ āvajjanajavanacittānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati,
anya-e1102n:334_11: Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhūtāni kammakammanimittagatinimittāni gocarabhāvaṃ na gacchantīti.
anya-e1102n:334_12: Cuticittassa pana paṭisandhicittena gahitaṃ atītārammaṇameva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati.
anya-e1102n:334_13: “Nāmarūpādikamevā ti ettha nāma”nti cittacetasikanibbānaṃ rūpanti aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e1102n:334_15: Nāmarūpā ca te dhammā ceti tathā.
anya-e1102n:334_16: Te ādi yesaṃ teti nāmarūpadhammādi tameva nāmarūpadhammādikaṃ.
anya-e1102n:334_18: tena nibbānampi arahato maraṇāsannakāle kriyajavanassapi ārammaṇabhāvo bhaveyyāti amhākaṃ khanti vīmaṃsitvā pana gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:334_19: Bhagavato nibbānacittassa pana tusitapurato cavitvā sirīmahāmāyāya kucchimhi vasitapaṭisandhicittena
anya-e1102n:334_20: gahitārammaṇameva ārammaṇaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ tañca kho gatinimittameva,
anya-e1102n:334_22: Yuttitopi āgamatopi gatinimittameva yujjati tathā hi tusitapureyeva setaketudevaputto hutvā dibbagaṇanāya cattāri sahassāni,
anya-e1102n:334_24: disvā suddhāvāse arahantabrahmunā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma devatāvisesehi ca.
anya-e1102n:337_1: kulaṃ mātarameva cā”ti vuttāni pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tusitapurato cavitvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva
anya-e1102n:337_4: Tadārammaṇāsannavīthito pubbabhāge ālokitāni kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena imāni pañca paṭisandhicittassa
anya-e1102n:337_5: gatinimittārammaṇabhāvena gocarabhāvaṃ gacchantīti amhākaṃ khanti tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāravasena bāhullappavattito
anya-e1102n:337_6: teneva abhidhammatthasaṅgahādīsu abhidhammattha vibhāvaniyaṃ “maraṇakāle yathārahaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ bhavantare
anya-e1102n:337_7: paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammaṃ vā taṃ kammakaraṇakāle rūpādikamupaladdhapubbamupakaraṇabhūtañca kammanimittaṃ
anya-e1102n:337_8: vā anantaramuppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbaṃ upabhogabhūtaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā kammabalena channaṃ dvārānamaññatarasmiṃ
anya-e1102n:337_10: tato paraṃ tameva tathopaṭṭhitamālambaṇaṃ ārabbha vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ parisuddhaṃ vā,
anya-e1102n:337_11: upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā upapajjitabbabhavānurūpaṃ tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṃ pavattati bāhullena.
anya-e1102n:337_12: Tameva vā pana janakabhūtaṃ kammaṃ abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:337_13: Paccāsannamaraṇassa pana tassa vīthicittāvasāne bhavaṅgakkhayevā cavanavasena paccuppannabhavapariyosānabhūtaṃ cuticittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e1102n:337_14: Tasmiṃ niruddhāvasāne tassānantarameva tathā gahitamālambaṇamārabbha savatthukamavatthukameva vā yathārahaṃ
anya-e1102n:337_15: avijjānusayaparikkhittena taṇhānusayamūlakena saṅkhārena janiyamānaṃ sampayuttehi pariggayhamānaṃ sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena
anya-e1102n:337_16: pubbaṅgamabhūtaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ mānasamuppajjamānameva patiṭṭhāti bhavantare”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:337_17: Tattha “tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānamabhiṇhaṃ pavattati bāhullenā”ti iminā kammabalena upaṭṭhitaṃ gatinimittaṃ
anya-e1102n:337_19: sattāhato uttaripi uppajjate vāti dasseti tathā hi parisuddhaṃ vā upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ gatinimittaṃ cirakālampi tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n:337_20: ariyagālatissacoraghātakādayo viya tathā hi ariyagālatisso nāma upāsako sīhaḷadīpe attano bhariyāya sumanāya
anya-e1102n:337_21: saddhiṃ yāvajīvaṃ dānādi puññakammāni katvā āyūhapariyosāne ariyagālatissassa maraṇamañce nipannassa
anya-e1102n:337_22: chadevalokato rathaṃ ānetvā attano attano devalokaṃ vaṇṇesuṃ.
anya-e1102n:337_23: Upāsako devatānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tusitapurato āhaṭarathaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesarathe “gahetvā gacchathā”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:337_24: Sumanā pana attano sāmikassa vacanaṃ sutvā “kiṃ tissa maraṇāsanne vilāpaṃ akāsī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:337_25: Tisso attano bhariyāya kathaṃ sutvā āha…
anya-e1102n:337_27: devalokato devatā cha rathe ānesuṃ tāhi devatāhi saddhaṃ kathemī”ti.
anya-e1102n:337_28: Taṃ napassāmi kuhi”nti vutte pupphadāmaṃ āharāpetvā ākāse khipāpesi.
anya-e1102n:337_29: Sā taṃ pupphadāmaṃ rathasīse olambamānaṃ disvā gabbhaṃ pavisitvā sayane sayitvā nāsikavātaṃ sannirujjhitvā cavitvā pāturahosi.
anya-e1102n:337_33: Ubhopi rathe ṭhatvā sabbe olokentānaṃyeva tusitapuraṃ agamaṃsu.
anya-e1102n:337_34: Imasmiñhi vatthusmiṃ sāmikassa upaṭṭhitagatinimittaṃ bhariyāya pākaṭaṃ hutvā puretaratusitapure nibbattitvā
anya-e1102n:337_35: sāmikassa sāsanaṃ pesesi tena ariyagālatissassa cirakālaṃ gatinimittaṃ upaṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:337_36: Manussaloke hi cirakālaṃ tusitapure muhuttaṃva hoti.
anya-e1102n:337_37: Evaṃ parisuddhaṃ vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ gatinimittaṃ cirakālaṃ pavattati iminā nayena duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayadhammikaupsakādīnampi
anya-e1102n:337_39: Coraghātakassa pana mahāniraye vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ nerayaggijālādikaṃ sattāhaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e1102n:337_40: Sāvatthinagare kira pañcasatā corā bahinagare corakammaṃ karonti.
anya-e1102n:337_41: Athekadivasaṃ janapadapuriso tesaṃ abbhantaro hutvā corakammaṃ akāsi,
anya-e1102n:337_43: Rājā te disvā “tumhākaṃ antare ime sabbe māretuṃ samatthassa jīvitaṃ dammī”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:337_44: Pañcasatā corā aññamaññaṃ sambandhā aññamaññaṃ sahāyakāti aññamaññaṃ māretuṃ na icchiṃsu,
anya-e1102n:337_45: janapadamanusso pana “ahaṃ māremī”ti vatvā sabbe māresi.
anya-e1102n:337_48: Rājā tassa mahallakoti vatvā aññassa coraghātaka kammaṃ dāpesi.
anya-e1102n:337_49: So coraghātakakammā apanīto aññatarassa santike nāsikavātaṃ uggaṇhitvā hatthapādakaṇṇanāsādīhi chinditabbānaṃ
anya-e1102n:337_50: ūrūthanakaṭṭhānaṃ bhindantamāretabbayuttānaṃ nāsikavātaṃ vissajjetvā māretabbaṃ mantaṃ labhi.
anya-e1102n:337_51: So rājānaṃ ārocetvā nāsikavātena coraghātakakammaṃ karontasseva tiṃsa vassāni atikkami.
anya-e1102n:337_52: So pacchā mahallako hutvā maraṇamañce nipajji “sattadivasena kālaṃ karissatī”ti.
anya-e1102n:337_54: So mahāniraye nibbatto viya mahāsaddaṃ katvā dukkhito hoti.
anya-e1102n:337_55: Tassa saddena bhītā manussā ubhatopasse gehaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:337_56: Tassa maraṇadivase sāriputtatthero dibbacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento etassa kālaṃ katvā mahāniraye nibbattamānaṃ
anya-e1102n:337_57: disvā tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca gehadvāre pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e1102n:337_59: Yāva tatiyaṃ vissajjamānopi vissajjāpetuṃ asakkonto theraṃ atirekena virocamānaṃ disvā cittaṃ pasādetvā pāyāsaṃ therassa dāpesi.
anya-e1102n:337_61: Coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṃ anussaritvā cavitvā sagge nibbatti,
anya-e1102n:337_64: Evaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā vipaccamāna kakammānurūpaṃ gatinimittampi sattāhaparamaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e1102n:337_66: Bhagavato pana parisuddhaṃ mettāpubbabhāgassa somanassa ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa kammassa vegena kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena
anya-e1102n:337_70: tathāpi manussaloke sattāhamatte kāle devatānaṃ pañcapubbanimittāni paññāyanti tañca kho puññavantānaṃyeva paññāyanti,
anya-e1102n:337_71: na sabbesaṃ manussaloke puññavantānaṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ viya taṃ disvā mahesakkhā devatā jānanti,
anya-e1102n:337_74: Mahesakkhā devatā taṃ pubbanimittaṃ disvā nandavanaṃ netvā “kālo devā”ti ādīhi yācanti.
anya-e1102n:337_75: Mahāsakko tattheva nandavanuyyāne kāladīpadesakulamātaravasena pañca viloketvā cavitvā tamārammaṇaṃ katvā
anya-e1102n:338_0: Tattha kālanti manussaloke ekūnatiṃsatime vasse vesākhapuṇṇamadivase buddho bhavissāmīti kālaṃ olokesi.
anya-e1102n:338_7: Tattha yasmiṃ kāle khattiyakulaṃ loke seṭṭhabhāvena “ayameva loke aggo”ti sammannati,
anya-e1102n:338_9: Yasmiṃ pana kāle brāhmaṇakulaṃ ayameva loke aggoti,
anya-e1102n:338_13: asambhinnakhattiyakulattā tasmā sakyarājakuleyeva bhavissāmīti kulaṃ olokesi.
anya-e1102n:338_14: Mātaranti mama mātaraṃ dasa māsāni satta ca divasāni ṭhassati,
anya-e1102n:338_15: etthantare mama mātuyā arogo bhavissatīti mātarampi olokesi.
anya-e1102n:338_17: Evaṃ yuttitopi āgamatopi bhagavato nibbānacittassa paṭasandhicittena gahitanimittameva ārammaṇaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:341_0: Dhātuparinibbānampi bodhimaṇḍeyeva bhavissati vuttañhetaṃ uparipaṇṇāsake “dhātuparinibbānaṃ anāgate bhavissati
anya-e1102n:341_1: sāsanassa hi osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā mahācetiyato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṃ,
anya-e1102n:341_3: Nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti sāsapamattāpi dhātuyo antarā na nassissanti,
anya-e1102n:341_4: sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandhā viya ekagghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjissanti,
anya-e1102n:341_6: Tato dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitvā ''ajja satthā parinibbāyati ajja sāsanaṃ osakkati pacchimadassanaṃ
anya-e1102n:341_7: idaṃ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave
anya-e1102n:341_9: dhātusarīrato tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati.
anya-e1102n:341_10: Sāsapamattāyapi dhātuyā sati ekajālā bhavissati dhātūsu pariyādānaṃ gatāsu pacchijjissati.
anya-e1102n:341_11: Evaṃ mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e1102n:341_14: Parinibbānakālato paṭṭhāya yāva sāsapamattā dhātu tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n:341_15: tāva buddhakālato pacchāti na veditabbaṃ dhātūsu hi ṭhitāsu buddhā ṭhitā va honti,
anya-e1102n:341_16: tasmā etthantare aññassa buddhassa uppatti nivāritāva hoti.
anya-e1102n:345_0: Yo karoti samaṃ pūjaṃ, phalaṃ tāsa samaṃ siyā’ti.
anya-e1102n:349_0: Idāni saṅgho ca dullabho loketi padassa vaṇṇanākkamo sampatto.
anya-e1102n:349_6: Tattha saṅkhepavasena sotāpattimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yugaṃ,
anya-e1102n:349_9: arahattamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekanti cattāri purisayugāni honti.
anya-e1102n:349_10: Cattāro maggaṭṭhā cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhapurisapuggalā honti.
anya-e1102n:349_12: tathā sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamaggaṭṭhāpi pañca pañcāti vīsati maggaṭṭhapuggalā,
anya-e1102n:349_13: tathā phalaṭṭhāpi sotapattiphalaṭṭhādivasena pañca pañcāti vīsati phalaṭṭhāti cattālīsapuggalā honti.
anya-e1102n:349_14: Ettha ca maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā kathaṃ vīsatimaggaṭṭhā puggalā bhaveyyunti.
anya-e1102n:350_1: cattāropi maggaṭṭhā paṭhamajjhānikādivohāraṃ labhantā paccekaṃ pañcapañcadhā vibhajiyanti,
anya-e1102n:350_3: Tattha paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasantassa vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā pavattā,
anya-e1102n:350_5: Yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ sammasantassa sā pavattā,
anya-e1102n:350_8: dutiyajjhānādīsu vā aññatarasadiso caturaṅgikādibhedo maggo bhaveyyā”ti evaṃ yogāvacarassa uppannajjhāsayo puggalajjhāsayo nāma.
anya-e1102n:350_9: Tattha yena paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
anya-e1102n:350_10: tassa so maggo paṭhamajjhānādi taṃ taṃ pādakajjhānasadiso hoti.
anya-e1102n:350_12: kevalaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṃ jhānaṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
anya-e1102n:350_14: Yadā panayaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato aññaṃ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti,
anya-e1102n:350_16: Evaṃ samathayānikassa puthujjanassa ariyānaṃ vā pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānapuggalajjhāsayavasena paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ
anya-e1102n:350_17: aññatarajhānasadisassa maggaṅgikassa pavattanato puggalabhedavasena vīsati maggaṭṭhā puggalā honti,
anya-e1102n:350_19: Aparampi sace pana puggalassa tathā vidho ajjhāsayo natthi,
anya-e1102n:350_20: anulomavasena heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānato vuṭṭhāya uparūparijhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo pādakajjhānamanapekkhitvā sammasitajjhānasadiso hoti.
anya-e1102n:350_21: Paṭilomavasena uparūparijhānato vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānamanapekkhitvā pādakajjhānasadiso hoti,
anya-e1102n:350_26: Kāmarūpārūpabhavesu adhigataphalā tayo sakadāgāminoti te sabbepi dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññaṃ,
anya-e1102n:350_29: sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññanti catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena catuvīsati,
anya-e1102n:350_42: cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa te sabbepi saddhādhurapaññādhurānaṃvasena dveguṇe hutvā aṭṭhasataṃ ariyapuggalā honti.
anya-e1102n:350_43: Te sabbepi “aṭṭhasataṃ vā”ti vitthāravasena uddiṭṭhā ariyapuggalā te saṅkhepato yugavasena sotāpatti
anya-e1102n:350_44: maggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yugantyādinā cattārova honti.
anya-e1102n:350_46: cattāri etāni yugāni hontī”ti ayaṃ pabhedomaggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhesu missakavasena labbhati jhānikavipassakapabhedo
anya-e1102n:350_47: pana phalaṭṭheyeva labbhati maggassa ekacittakkhatikattā maggaṭṭhesu na labbhati.
anya-e1102n:350_49: Tesu jhāniko puggalo tasmiṃ bhave arahattappatto parinibbāyati.
anya-e1102n:350_52: Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana nikantiyā sati puthujjanādayo yathāladdhajjhānassa bhūmibhūte suddhāvāsavajjite yattha
anya-e1102n:350_53: katthaci nibbattanti tathā kāmabhavepi kāmāvacarakammabalena “ijjhati hi bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi
anya-e1102n:350_55: Anāgāmino pana kāmarāgassa sabbaso pahīnattā kāmabhavesu nikantiṃ na uppādentīti kāmalokavajjite yathāladdhassa
anya-e1102n:350_56: bhūmi bhūte yattha katthaci nibbattantī’ti vuttaṃ tathā hi anāgāmisseva kāmabhave nikantiyā pahīnattā
anya-e1102n:350_57: sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi nikantiyā sati kāmabhave kāmāvacarakammabalena uppattibhāvo avāritova hotīti
anya-e1102n:350_59: so jhāniko nāmāti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vutta”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:350_63: Tattha eko manussaloke vā hotu chadevaloke vā,
anya-e1102n:350_65: ayaṃ ekabījī nāma eko manussaloke ekā paṭisandhi devaloke ekāti dvepaṭisandhiko vā,
anya-e1102n:350_66: evaṃ ticatupañcachaparamo hutvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyati,
anya-e1102n:350_68: Eko manussaloke sotāpanno hutvā devaloke ekā paṭisandhi tato punāgantvā manussaloke ekāti evaṃ manussadevalokamissakavasena
anya-e1102n:350_69: tattha cattāri idha tīṇityādinā tattha cha,
anya-e1102n:350_70: idha ekoti yāva sattapaṭisandhiko hutvā parinibbāyati,
anya-e1102n:350_72: Kevalaṃ pana manussaloke yeva satta devalokeyeva vā sattāti evaṃ amisso hutvā paṭisandhiko gahetabbo apare pana “ito satta,
anya-e1102n:350_73: tato satta saṃsāre vicarantī”ti vuttattā manussalokasattapaṭisandhidevaloka sattapaṭisandhivasena sattakkhattuparamaṃ vadanti.
anya-e1102n:350_74: Taṃ ayuttaṃ kasmā “kiñcāpi te honti bhusaṃpamattā,
anya-e1102n:350_75: na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti pāḷiyā virodhattā.
anya-e1102n:350_76: Apica dvibhavaparicchinno sakadāgāmīpi dvikkhattuṃ manussalokaṃ āgato bhaveyya,
anya-e1102n:350_78: idha ekanti vārassa labbhitabbato na panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:350_79: Sakiṃ imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī idha patvā idha parinibbāyī,
anya-e1102n:350_82: idha patvā tattha parinibbāyīti pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamako idha adhippeto.
anya-e1102n:350_83: Yadi evaṃ idha patvā idha parinibbāyīti ādayo cattāro kathaṃ sakadāgāmīnāmāti.
anya-e1102n:350_84: Te sakiṃ puna āgacchatīti vacanatthena sakadāgāmī nāma.
anya-e1102n:350_85: Kāmataṇhāya sabbaso pahīnattā imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ anāgacchatīti anāgāmī,
anya-e1102n:350_86: niccaṃ brahmalokeyeva paṭisandhi vasena āgacchatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e1102n:350_88: sukkhavipassakassa kathanti sopi jhānikova hutvā gacchati tassa hi maggantare sīhabyagghādīhi hatassāpi
anya-e1102n:350_89: lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā jhāniko hutvāva maraṇaṃ hoti ayaṃ pana rūpārūpabhavena ekakkhattuparamo nāma.
anya-e1102n:350_90: Sattakkhattuparamādayo ariyā rūpārūpalokesu anekakkhattupaṭisandhikāpi brahmalokasāmaññena ekapaṭisandhikā nāma honti.
anya-e1102n:350_91: Arahā pana pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvā dakkhiṇaṃ arahattā puna bhavā bhinibbattiyārahābhāvātyādinā vacanatthena arahā nāma.
anya-e1102n:350_95: Aparopi puthujjanasekkhasantāne jhāniko hutvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā maggaṃ uppādeti,
anya-e1102n:350_97: Sukkhavipassako pana kilesakkhayamattameva maggena saha anāgatajhānaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e1102n:350_102: Tattha yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu yeneva iriyapathena samannāgato hutvā vipassanaṃ ārabhati,
anya-e1102n:350_103: teneva iriyāpathena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyati ayaṃ iriyāpathasamasīsī nāma.
anya-e1102n:350_104: Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antoroge eva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāyati ayaṃ rogasamasīsi nāma.
anya-e1102n:350_105: Yo pana terasasu sīsesu kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati,
anya-e1102n:350_108: Tattha terasa sīsāni katamāni terasa sīsāni.
anya-e1102n:350_122: Ettha ca avijjā pariyādāyakaṃ maggacittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e1102n:350_123: jīvitapariyādāyakaṃ cuticittaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e1102n:350_132: arahattamagge sesakilesābhāvā cattārīti ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā
anya-e1102n:350_133: parinibbāyato imāya vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsa pariyādānampi samaṃ hoti nāma.
anya-e1102n:350_134: Arahattamagge ca pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pavattito vuṭṭhahanto maggo cutito uddhaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena yadipi pariyādiyati.
anya-e1102n:350_136: tāva pavattisabhāvato pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati nāma.
anya-e1102n:350_137: Kilesapariyādānena maggacittena attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā paccavekkhaṇavārāva paripuṇṇā.
anya-e1102n:350_138: Paripuṇṇavasena pahīnakilese paccavekkhaṇato kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahanti,
anya-e1102n:350_139: teneva kilesasīsaṃ avijjāpariyādānañca pavattisīsaṃ jīvitindriyapariyādānañca samaṃ katvā imāya vārasamatāya
anya-e1102n:350_141: Saṃyuttaṭhakathāyaṃ pana yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca,
anya-e1102n:350_143: Ettha ca pavattisīsaṃ kilesasīsanti dve sīsāni.
anya-e1102n:350_153: Tikhiṇena asinā sīse chindantepi hi eko vā dve vā paccavekkhaṇavārā avassaṃ uppajjantiyeva,
anya-e1102n:350_154: cittānaṃ pana lahuparivattitāya āsavakkhayo ca jīvitapariyādānañca ekakkhaṇe viya sañjāyatī’ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:350_159: Kiñcāpi eko vā dve vā ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e1102n:350_161: Yāva ekaṃ vā dve vā tadārammaṇacittānīti heṭṭhimantena dve pavattantīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:350_163: aparipuṇṇaṃ pañchakkhattuṃ pavattiyā”ti iminā aṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanena samasīsīnaṃ paccavekkhaṇāvasena
anya-e1102n:350_165: aparipuṇṇavasena pañcakkhattuṃ kriyajavanāni javantīti sanniṭṭhānametthāva gantabbaṃ.
anya-e1102n:350_166: “Asammūḷho kālaṃ karotī”ti vuttattā ca viññāyati sattakkhattuṃ paripuṇṇavasena maraṇāsannakāle javanapavatti.
anya-e1102n:350_167: Evañca sati “mandappavattiyaṃ pana maraṇakālādīsu pañcavāramevā”ti ettha “mandappavattiya”nti visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyā.
anya-e1102n:350_170: Kāmāvacarajavanānañca aniyataparimāṇā balavakālepi parisampuṇṇabhāvā tathā hi “kāmāvacarajavanānibalavakāle sattakkhattuṃ chakkhattuṃ vā,
anya-e1102n:350_172: Bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu lahukappavattiyaṃ cattāri pañcavā paccavekkhaṇajavanacittāni bhavantī”ti
anya-e1102n:350_173: aniyamitappamāṇavasena uppattibhāvo āgato imasmiṃ samasīsiniddesavārepi maraṇāsannavīthicittassa visuṃ
anya-e1102n:350_174: alabbhanato paccavekkhaṇanteyeva bhavaṅgacittena parinibbānato paripuṇṇavasena satta javanacittāni pāṭikaṅkhitabbānīti
anya-e1102n:350_175: amhākaṃ khanti vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbo ito yuttataro vā pakāro labbhamāno gavesitabbo.
anya-e1102n:350_178: cattālīsampipuggalā aṭṭhasatampi purisapuggalāti sabbaṃ samodhānetvā imasmiṃ loke saṅghopi dullabhoti
anya-e1102n:350_179: veditabbo tathā hi ariyapuggalā atidullabhāva sāsanassa vijjamānakālepi idāni sotāpannassāpi avijjamānato
anya-e1102n:350_183: Kasmā buddhuppādakāleyeva labbhanato tathā hi anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhānaṃ satasahassādigaṇane uppajjamānepi
anya-e1102n:350_184: tesaṃ santike upasampadābhāvassa alabbhamānato paccekabuddhānañhi santike pabbajitānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ saraṇagamanakammaṭṭhānassāpi
anya-e1102n:350_186: Paccekabuddhā ca nāma mūgassa supinadassanaṃ viya attanā paṭiladdhasaccadhamme paresaṃ ācikkhituṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e1102n:350_187: tasmā te pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojetuṃ asamatthā “evaṃ te nivāsetabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:350_188: evaṃ te pārupitabba”nti ādinānayena abhisamācārikameva sikkhāpesuṃ tasmā buddhuppādakāleyeva sammutisaṅgho labbhati.
anya-e1102n:350_190: atha kho tasmiṃ uddissa appamattakassāpi katākārassa asaṅkhyeyyaphalāpi honti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “bhavissanti
anya-e1102n:350_191: kho panānanda anāgatamaddhānaṃ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa
anya-e1102n:350_193: tadā pāhaṃ ānanda saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyyaṃ vadāmi na tvevāhaṃ ānanda kenaci pariyāyena
anya-e1102n:350_194: saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā pāṭipuggalikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ mahapphalanti vadāmī”ti.
anya-e1102n:350_195: Tathā hi uparipaṇṇāsake dakkhiṇavibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ “kāsāvakaṇṭhānaṃ saṅghe dinne dakkhiṇāpi guṇāsaṅkhyāya asaṅkhyeyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e1102n:350_196: Saṅghagatadakkhiṇā hi saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa hoti.
anya-e1102n:350_197: Saṅghe pana cittīkāro dukkaro yo hi “saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti deyyadhammaṃ paṭiyādetvā vihāraṃ
anya-e1102n:350_198: gantvā bhante saṅghaṃ uddissa ekaṃ theraṃ dethā’ti vadati,
anya-e1102n:350_199: atha saṅghato sāmaṇeraṃ labhitvā “sāmaṇero me laddho”ti aññathattaṃ āpajjati,
anya-e1102n:350_201: Mahātheraṃ labhitvā pi “mahāthero me laddho”ti somanassaṃ uppādentassāpi na hotiyeva.
anya-e1102n:350_203: Yo pana sāmaṇeraṃ upasampannaṃ vā daharaṃ vā theraṃ vā bālaṃ vā paṇḍitaṃ vā yaṃkiñci saṅghato labhitvā
anya-e1102n:350_204: nibbematiko hutvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e1102n:350_206: Parasamuddavāsino kira evaṃ karonti tattha hi eko vihārassāmikuṭumbiko “saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti
anya-e1102n:350_207: saṅghato uddisitvā “ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dethā”ti yācitvā so ekaṃ dussīlabhikkhuṃ labhitvā nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ opuñjāpetvā
anya-e1102n:350_208: āsanaṃ paññapetvā upari vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhadhūmapupphehi pūjetvā pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā buddhassa
anya-e1102n:350_209: nipaccakāraṃ karonto viya saṅghe cittīkārena deyyadhammaṃ adāsi so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ vihāraṃ jagganatthāya
anya-e1102n:350_210: “kudālakaṃ dethā”ti gharadvāraṃ āgato upāsako nisinnova kudālaṃ pādena khipitvā “gaṇhā”ti adāsi tamenaṃ
anya-e1102n:350_211: manussā āhaṃsu “tumhehi pātova etassa katasakkāro vattuṃ na sakkā,
anya-e1102n:350_217: sāriputtamoggalānādayo asītimahātherā sodhenti api ca therā ciraparinibbutā,
anya-e1102n:350_218: there ādiṃ katvā yāvajjatanā dharamānakhīṇāsavā sodhentiyeva,
anya-e1102n:350_219: tathā hi dāyakato paṭiggāhatopi mahapphalaṃ hoti dānaṃ.
anya-e1102n:350_220: Dāyakato vessantarajātakaṃ kathetabbaṃ vessantaro hi dussīlassa jūjakābrāhmaṇassa nayanasadise dve jālīkaṇhājine putte datvā pathaviṃ kampesi.
anya-e1102n:350_221: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha pavattacetanāya mahantabhāvena pathaviṃ kampesi.
anya-e1102n:350_223: Paṭiggāhakato pana sāriputtattherassa dinnacoraghātakavatthu kathetabbaṃ coraghātako nāma hi sāvatthiyaṃ
anya-e1102n:350_224: eko janapadapuriso pañcavīsati vassāni coraghātakakammaṃ katvā mahallakakālepi tiṃsa vassāni nāsikavāteneva
anya-e1102n:350_225: kaṇṇanāsādīni chinditvā coraghātakakammaṃ karontasseva pañcapaññāsa vassāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n:350_226: So maraṇa mañce nipannova attano kammabalena mahāniraye nibbatto viya mahāsaddaṃ katvā dukkhito hoti,
anya-e1102n:350_227: tassa saddena bhītā manussā ubhato passe gehaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
anya-e1102n:350_228: Tadā sāriputtatthero dibbacakkhu nā lokaṃ volokento taṃ disvā tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca tassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n:350_229: So kujjhitvā tikkhattuṃ nāsikavātena vissajjamānopi vissajjituṃ asakkonto ativirocamānaṃ theraṃ disvā
anya-e1102n:350_230: ativiya pasīditvā attano atthāya sampāditaṃ pāyāsaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1102n:350_232: Coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṃ anussaritvā sagge nibbatti,
anya-e1102n:353_0: Natthi citte pasannamhi, appakā nāma dakkhiṇā.
anya-e1102n:356_2: Seyyathāpi makkhaligosālachasatthārādīnaṃ attano upāsakamicchādiṭṭhīhi pūjāvisesā vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā.
anya-e1102n:358_0: Na so saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti.
anya-e1102n:359_1: Imāni tīṇi buddhadhammasaṅgharatanāni sādhūnaṃ ratijananatthena ratanāni nāma.
anya-e1102n:363_6: kasmā yasmā aviññāṇakaṃ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādiratanaṃ saviññāṇakānaṃ hattiratanādīnaṃ alaṅkāratthāya upanīyati.
anya-e1102n:363_9: Kasmā yasmā tiracchānagataratanaṃ manussaratanassa opavayhaṃ hoti.
anya-e1102n:363_12: Kasmā yasmā itthiratanaṃ purisaratanassa paricārikattaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e1102n:363_13: Purisaratanampi duvidhaṃ agārikaratanaṃ anagārikaratanañca tattha anagārikaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
anya-e1102n:363_14: Kasmā yasmā agārikaratanesu aggo cakkavattīpi sīlādiguṇayuttaṃ anagārikaratanaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
anya-e1102n:363_15: upaṭṭhahitvā payirupāsitvā dibbamānussikā sampattiyo pāpuṇitvā ante nibbānasampattiṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e1102n:363_24: Sāriputtamoggalānasadisāpi hi anekasatā sāvakā paccekabuddhassa guṇānaṃ satabhāgampi na upanenti.
anya-e1102n:363_26: Kasmā guṇamahattatāya sakalampi jambudīpaṃ pallaṅke na pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭṭento nisinnā paccekasambuddhā ekassa
anya-e1102n:363_27: guṇānaṃ neva saṅkhyaṃ kalaṃ gaṇanabhāgaṃ upanenti,
anya-e1102n:363_28: vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā…pe…
anya-e1102n:363_32: saṅgho ca dullabho loke”ti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ atthuddhāravasena sabbaso attho vuttoyeva hoti.
anya-e1102n:367_0: Idāni sappurisāti dullabhāti imassa saṃvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tathā hi loke sappurisāpi atidullabhāyeva.
anya-e1102n:367_3: maraṇadhammā sattā maraṇato muccanti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “mamañhi ānanda kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātiyā parimuccanti,
anya-e1102n:367_4: jarādhammā sattā jarāya muccantī”ti ādi vacanato pana sammāsambuddhoyeva sabbākārasampanno kalyāṇamitto nāma.
anya-e1102n:367_6: Tepi alabhantena ekantajahitaṃ sivaṭṭhikaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ labhitabbaṃ,
anya-e1102n:370_1: Katamo paṇḍitapuggalo buddhapaccekabuddhā asīti ca mahāsāvakā aññe ca tathāgatassa sāvakā sunettamahāgovindavidhurasarabhaṅgamahosadhasutasomanimirājaayogharakumāraka
anya-e1102n:370_6: attano vacanakarānaṃ sabbabhayaupaddavūpasaggaviddhaṃsanasamatthā honti tathā hi tathāgataṃ āgamma asaṅkhyeyyā
anya-e1102n:370_7: aparimāṇā devamanussā āsavakkhayaṃ pattā brahmaloke patiṭṭhitā,
anya-e1102n:370_9: Sāriputtatthere cittaṃ pasādetvā catūhi ca paccayehi theraṃ upaṭṭhahitvā asīti kusalahassāni sagge nibbattāni,
anya-e1102n:370_10: tathā mahāmoggalānamahākassapapabhuti sunettassa satthuno sāvakā appekacce brahmaloke upapajjiṃsu,
anya-e1102n:373_0: Akittipaṇḍito sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n:374_0: “Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase;
anya-e1102n:376_0: Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ dhīro, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e1102n:378_0: Nayaṃ nayati medhāvī, adurāyaṃ na yuñjati;
anya-e1102n:379_0: Sanaro seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1102n:380_0: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo”ti.
anya-e1102n:381_0: Apica tepi sappurise saṅgamma assutapubbampi ubhayalokahitāvahaṃ vācaṃ suyyateva, vuttampi cetaṃ.
anya-e1102n:382_0: “Subhāsitaṃ uttamamāhu santo, dhammaṃ bhaṇe nādhammaṃ taṃ dutiyaṃ;
anya-e1102n:383_0: Piyaṃ bhaṇe nāppiyaṃ taṃ tatiyaṃ, saccaṃ bhaṇe nālīkaṃ taṃ catuttha”nti ca.
anya-e1102n:386_2: yato tesampi upakārānussaraṇatā kataññutā sappurisehi pasaṃsanīyādinānappakāravisesādhigamahetūca honti vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā,
anya-e1102n:386_7: Apica vidhuramahosadhajātakādikālepi idhalokaparalokasampattiatthameva attano vacanakare sammā yojenti.
anya-e1102n:386_8: Anākulakammantādhiṭṭhānena kālaññutāya patirūpakāritāya analasatāya uṭṭhānavīriyasamatāya abyasaniyatāca
anya-e1102n:386_10: ete attano vā puttadārassa vā dāsakammakarānaṃ vā byattatāya evaṃ payojitā diṭṭheva dhamme dhanadhaññavitti paṭilābhahetū honti,
anya-e1102n:387_0: Patirūpakārīri dhuravā, uṭṭhānatā vindate dhananti ca;
anya-e1102n:392_0: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca; Tiṇāni yo na maññati;
anya-e1102n:393_0: Sappurisakiccāni, so sukhaṃ na vihāyatī”ti ca.
anya-e1102n:396_1: Tabbigamena duppurisā bālajanā agavesantopi labbhanteva te bālā attānaṃ sevamāne parajane saṃsāradukkheyeva
anya-e1102n:396_2: osīdenti bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ na denti tathā hi pūraṇakassapādayo chasatthārā devadattakokālika-
anya-e1102n:396_3: modakatissa khaṇḍadeviyāputtasamuddadattaciñcamāṇavikādayo atītakāle ca dīghadukkhassa lābhāti ime aññe
anya-e1102n:396_4: ca evarūpā sattā bālā aggipadittamiva agāraṃ attanā duggahitena attānañca attano vacanakārake ca vināsenti
anya-e1102n:396_7: Rājā ajātasattu sāmaññaphalasuttantasavanakāle yadi pitaraṃ aghāteyya,
anya-e1102n:396_8: sotāpanno bhaveyya pitaraṃ ghātitattā maggaphalampi appatvā lohakumbhiyaṃ saṭṭhivassasahassāni paccitvā muccissati anāgatepi paccekabuddho bhavissati.
anya-e1102n:396_9: Kokālikopi sāriputtamoggalānatthere anapacāyitvā mahāniraye padumagaṇanāya paccanokāse nirayapadese padumaniraye…pe…
anya-e1102n:396_10: padumaṃ kho pana aññataro bhikkhu nirayaṃ kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggalānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā”ti āha.
anya-e1102n:396_11: Tattha aññataro bhikkhūti nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ “kiṃ va dīghaṃ nukho bhante padume niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti
anya-e1102n:396_12: pañhaṃ pucchitvā nisinnaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ evamāha “dīghaṃ kho bhikkhu niraye āyuppamāṇaṃ,
anya-e1102n:396_13: taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ ettakāni vassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatānīti vā ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā
anya-e1102n:396_14: ettakāni vassasatasahassānī”ti vā sakkā pana bhante upamaṃ kātunti.
anya-e1102n:396_16: Seyyathāpi bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho hoti,
anya-e1102n:396_17: tato puriso vassasatassa vassasahassassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya,
anya-e1102n:396_18: khippataraṃ kho so bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e1102n:396_22: Vīsatikhāriko ti māgadhikena patthena cattāro patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho hoti.
anya-e1102n:396_29: Abbudo nirayoti abbudo nāma eko paccekanirayo natthi,
anya-e1102n:396_30: avīcimhi eva pana abbudagaṇanāya paccanokāso “abbudo nirayo”ti vutto.
anya-e1102n:396_32: Tattha vassagaṇanāpi evaṃ veditabbā yathāha “sataṃsatasahassāni koṭi hoti evaṃ sataṃsahassakoṭiyo pakoṭi nāma.
anya-e1102n:396_38: Esa nayo sabbattha ayañca gaṇanā aparicitānaṃ dukkarā”ti vuttaṃ taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu’nti keci pana
anya-e1102n:396_39: tattha paridevanānattenapi kammakaraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānīti vadanti.
anya-e1102n:396_41: Yathā ca dīghavidassaāghātā ca buddhantaraṃ saṭṭhiyojanamattena attabhāvena uttāno patito mahāniraye paccati yathā ca,
anya-e1102n:396_42: tassa diṭṭhiabhirucitāni pañca kulasatāni tasseva sahabyataṃ uppannāni mahāniraye paccanti.
anya-e1102n:396_43: Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā “seyyathāpi bhikkhave naḷāgāraṃ vā tiṇāgāraṃ vā aggiphuṭṭho kūṭāgārāni dahati ullittāvalittāni
anya-e1102n:396_44: nivātāni phusitaggaḷāni pihita vātapānāni evameva kho bhikkhave yānikānici bhayāni uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n:396_50: Iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo appaṭibhayo paṇḍito saupaddavo bālo anupaddavo paṇḍito,
anya-e1102n:396_54: Chaḍḍanīyataṃ jigucchanīyatañca āpajjati viññūnaṃ vuttampi cetaṃ nāradajātake.
anya-e1102n:399_0: Akattipaṇḍitocāpi sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n:400_0: “Bālaṃ na passe na suṇe, na ca bālena saṃvase;
anya-e1102n:401_0: Bālenā’llāpasallāpaṃ, na kare na ca rocaye.
anya-e1102n:402_0: Kiṃnu te akaraṃ bālo, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e1102n:405_0: Dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto pakuppati;
anya-e1102n:406_0: Vinayaṃ so na jānāti, sādhu tassa adassana”nti.
anya-e1102n:411_1: Tattha dullabhañca manussattanti manussabhāvopi dullabhoyeva manussassa dullabhabhāvo kāṇakacchapopamādīhi
anya-e1102n:411_2: veditabbo eko kira kassako gaṅgātīre tīṇi saṃvaccharāni kasitvā kiñcimattampi alabhitvā naṅgalaphālaṃ
anya-e1102n:411_3: dvedhā bhinditvā gaṅgāyaṃ khipi tena gaṅgānadiyā vāhena eko uddhaṃ eko heṭṭhāti evaṃ dve naṅgalaphālakā
anya-e1102n:411_4: gaṅgāyaṃ vuyhantā cirena eko uddhaṃ eko heṭṭhāti dve ekato hutvā pākatikā yujjanti tasmiṃ khaṇe vassasatavassasahassaccayena
anya-e1102n:411_5: ekavāraṃ ummujjamāno kāṇakacchapo ummujjamānakkhaṇe tassa gīvā dvinnaṃ naṅgalaphālānamantare hoti ayaṃ
anya-e1102n:411_6: kālo dullabhova evameva manussattabhāvopi dullabhoyeva tathāhi manussattabhāvaṃ alabhitvāva nirayapetaasurakāyatiracchānabhūmīsuyeva
anya-e1102n:411_7: saṃsaritvā sīsampi ukkhipituṃ alabhantā ekabuddhantarā dve buddhantarā tayo buddhantarā cattāro buddhantarā
anya-e1102n:411_9: tathā petaasurakāyatiracchānabhūmīsupi atikhuddakena attabhāvena tilabījasāsapabījassa catupañcachasattaaṭṭhakalabhāgamatteneva
anya-e1102n:411_10: aṅguliyā patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānamatteyeva bhūmipadese nisinnānaṃ atikhuddakasattānaṃ gaṇanapathampi vītivattā
anya-e1102n:411_11: te hi gaṇituṃ iddhimantapuggale ṭhapetvā añño ko nāma sakkhissati tehi mohandhabhāvena kaṇhasukkapakkhampi
anya-e1102n:411_12: ajānantā anekesu buddhasatesu vā buddhasahassesu vā uppajjamānesupi buddhotisaddaṃ asutvā vītivattā,
anya-e1102n:411_15: Buddhuppādakālepi sammādiṭṭhi hutvā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti dullabhāva,
anya-e1102n:411_17: tasmimpi sati aṅgavikalabhāvena saddhammasavanassāpi dullabhattāti evamādippabhedā manussattabhāvādikā khaṇasampattiyo dullabhāti veditabbā.
anya-e1102n:411_18: Dullabhā khaṇasampattīti kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti dullabhāyeva tathā hi paccantavisaya arūpaasaññasattatiracchānapetanerayikakāle
anya-e1102n:411_19: vā majjhimadesepi cakkhādiaṅgavikalevā paripuṇṇaaṅgabhāvepi micchādiṭṭhibhūtā vā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā
anya-e1102n:411_20: khaṇā na honti paccantavisaye hi pavattā janā pāṇātipātādidasaakusalakammapatheyeva ramanti abhiramanti,
anya-e1102n:411_23: Arūpinopi puggalā paratoghosavirahitattā sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhopi tesaṃ natthi,
anya-e1102n:411_25: Asaññasattatiracchānapetanerayikakālesu pana pageva pūritapāramīnaṃ sattānaṃ pavattanampi abbohārikaṃ,
anya-e1102n:411_27: sotavikalena dhammasavanatopi hāyati eḷamūgādibhāvena kusalasamādānā na honti.
anya-e1102n:411_29: sabbajanānaṃ nayanarasāyatanabhūtaṃ sabbaññubuddhampi disvā pasādasommena cakkhunā oloketabbampi na maññanti
anya-e1102n:411_30: manopadosavaseneva yugaggāhā hutvā yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu anekepi micchādiṭṭhino mahāniraye uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n:417_0: Evaṃ satthuparinibbānato vassasataccayena patiṭṭhite isinā kāritattā’ isinagara’nti laddhanāme dvattapādibhūpālānaṃ
anya-e1102n:417_1: nivāsaṭṭhānabhūte sīrikhettanagare erāvatiyā nadiyā pārimatīrabhūte pabbatasānumhi patiṭṭhitassa kañcanavaramahāthūpassa
anya-e1102n:417_2: dāyakassa satvivamahādhammarañño kāle sāsanassa dvisahassasatādhikaekatiṃsatime vasse sāsane paṭiladdhasaddhānaṃ
anya-e1102n:417_3: kulaputtānaṃ mahājānikaraṇavasena vimativinodaniyā vuttavacanaṃ saddayuttiatthayuttivasena sādhukaṃ avicinitvā
anya-e1102n:417_4: nadiyā udakukkhepaṃ akatvā upasampadā kammassa kāritattā sāsane parājayamāpanne kulaputte upārambhakaraṇavasena
anya-e1102n:418_0: Ettāvatā ca sirikhettanagaragocaragāmena satvivamahādhammarājagurubhūtena mahāveyyākaraṇena tipiṭakadharena’saddhammakovido’ti
anya-e1102n:418_1: pākaṭa nāmadheyyena mahātherena upajjhāyo hutvā paññādhipatīnaṃ nivāsabhūte pacchimajinacakkasāsanavare
anya-e1102n:418_3: rājagurunā tipiṭakanāgattherena ca ācariyo hutvā vejjakammajaṅghapesanakammādivasena anesanaṃ pahāya
anya-e1102n:418_4: sammā ājīvena visuddhājīvehi saṅghagaṇehi kārakasaṅghā hutvā sirikhettanagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge dīghapabbatasānumhi
anya-e1102n:418_5: erāvatiyā nadiyā tīre vālikapuḷine sīmāpekkhāya saha udakukkhepaṃ katvā pavattāya udakukkhepasīmāya dasadhā
anya-e1102n:418_6: byañjanavipattiṃ akatvā ṭhānārahena ñatticatutthena kammena upasampadāya vīsativassena sāgarabuddhīti
anya-e1102n:418_7: garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena bhikkhunā racito sāsanavipattihārako sīmavisodhanī nāma gantho samatto.
anya-e1102n:426_0: Evaṃ pāṇinaṃ sabbe, sīghaṃ sijjhantu saṅkappā.
anya-e1102n:428_0: Tāva tiṭṭhatu yaṃ gantho, sāsane hārayaṃ tamaṃ.
anya-e1102n:429_0: Uddhaṃ yāva bhavaggā ca, adho yāva avīcito;
anya-e1102n:432_0: Ciraṃ jīvatu no rājā, sāsanassa ujjotako.
